name: Find Room 96
summary: You are trying to find room 96 but you are stuck in a loop. To find room 96, observe your surroundings and get familiar with it.

name: Mark of the Deep
summary: Mark of the Deep is a pirate-themed adventure with a narrative focus and a mix of Metroidvania and Souls-Like elements. Embark on this journey, explore the mysteries of a cursed island, and find your missing pirate crew!

name: Neon Sword
summary: Neon Sword is an open world 3rd person top down action roleplay game with elements of business simulation. The non-linear story has multiple choices that effect the world around you leading you down many paths; the person you become is shaped by your decisions made within the game.

name: The Scramble Vice
summary: It is the year 2048. Tokyo Police Department’s notorious 9th Mobile Unit, “The Scramble Vice” is ready to fight high-tech robot crime! Clad in an armed exoskeleton suit, police officer Sakuragi Kei of the 9th unit stands to fight robot crimes within Neo Tokyo! Are you ready to scramble up Tokyo?

name: AdventureQuest 8-Bit: Dungeons & DoomKnights
summary: Can you defeat the DoomKnight and his army of the evil undead? Explore a huge world and battle vampires, ghosts, deathknights, liches, ancient evils, giant flying eyeballs, chicken cows... and other unspeakable horrors!

name: Cornsweeper
summary: Cornsweeper is a chill & whimsical, reimagining of a beloved classic, Minesweeper. A meditative mind-sweep-em-up; pop delicious popcorn, avoid explosions.

name: Mighty Guy
summary: Mighty Guy is an action game originally released by Nichibutsu in Japanese arcades in 1986. Use your PSYCHO GUN in addition to superhuman actions like punches, kicks, and beams to take down enemies and stop the massive supercomputer "ZELDA" in its schemes to genetically modify humanity and take over the world!

name: The Spy Who Shot Me
summary: The Spy Who Shot Me is a comedy retro FPS inspired by classic shooters of the 90s.

name: Arcade Game Zone
summary: Arcade Game Zone brings together 40 mini-games, including 30 faithful replicas of classics found in legendary arcade cabinets.

name: Electrician Simulator
summary: Test your skills, or learn from scratch in Electrician Simulator, a game where you take on the role of a young electrician, who has been passionate about all kinds of electrical repairs & work all his life.

name: Isolated
summary: Experience the solitude of being the loneliest person on Earth! Stranded on a tiny island, your mission is to conquer each day until you can make it back home.

name: Supernormal
summary: Inspired by Allison Road, Supernormal is a psychological horror game set in a seemingly ordinary apartment harboring dark secrets. Play as Detective Wyatt, tasked with unravelling the disappearance of Masato Sakamoto's daughter. Search for clues and unravel the sinister truth.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow
summary: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Alphadia I & II
summary: The legends of energi once again in a new edition! Step into the enchanting world of Alphadia, a revitalized epic fantasy RPG series that merges the first two titles, 'Alphadia I' and 'Alphadia II', into a single, captivating adventure.

name: Laika: Aged Through Blood
summary: Enter a sand strewn post-apocalyptic world in Laika: Aged Through Blood. Drive, jump and fight your way across the desert as you ride your way through an epic story. This "motorvania" game has a huge, openly explorable world filled with NPCs to meet, secrets to discover and enemies to destroy.

name: Reigns: Three Kingdoms
summary: Reigns: Three Kingdoms will bring the card-based RPG binary choices of the series into the Romance of the Three Kingdoms period of Chinese history.

name: Wild Seas
summary: Defend the jewel of evil pirates! Wild Seas is a tower defense game with rogue-like elements, where your positioning can ensure victory

name: Crystal Project
summary: Crystal Project is a non-linear JRPG where you are the maker of your own adventure. Explore the world while you find Crystals, unlock classes, learn abilities, and create a strategy to take down the world's toughest bosses as you seek to fulfill the prophecy to bring balance to the land of Sequoia.

name: Grotto
summary: Grotto is a mystical, narrative-focused experience. You are the Soothsayer, capable of talking with the stars and unveiling their messages. In a time of turmoil, the tribe of the valley turn to your powers of divination for guidance.

name: Wicked Times
summary: Wicked Times is an RPG manager/autobattler. Embark on a journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions who occupy the lands. Collect gold. Upgrade your equipment. Find new towns and activities that give you extra experience and gold along the way.

name: Bugby
summary: The cute bug has places to go! See how far you can go without bumping into the nasties!

name: Sovereign Syndicate
summary: A Victorian steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice. Investigate the disappearance of society’s most vulnerable to uncover a mysterious cult. Play as three characters, each with their own skills and motivations. Customize your characters with narrative choices to unlock new tarot cards.

name: Ultimate Racing 2D 2
summary: The ultimate top-down racing game is back! Ultimate Racing 2D 2 includes new cars, new tracks, car/track editor, time-trial mode, improved online multiplayer and career mode, new settings and more.

name: nDay
summary: Start your day by planning in order to save time and avoid forgetting anything. Note all important events and appointments, and never miss a meeting again.

name: Tintin Reporter: Cigars of the Pharaoh
summary: With a story full of twists, Tintin Reporter: Cigars of the Pharaoh thrusts Tintin into a series of action-packed puzzles as he tries to solve an international drug trafficking case by exploring the Orient, an ancient temple, a desert, a lush jungle and other magnificent but challenging locations.

name: Atlas Wept
summary: A Humanist retro-style RPG game about sincerity and empathy, featuring friendly robot dogs and evil smiley faces.

name: Golden Sun: The Lost Age
summary: Final Fantasy-like RPG that continues the story of a group of young heroes on a mission to bring peace back to the world of Weyard.

name: Nephenthesys
summary: Blast off on a treacherous mission to recover an unidentified energy source amidst an alien onslaught! Nephenthesys is a vertical scrolling shoot’em up presented in widescreen top-down 3D style.

name: Three Kingdoms Zhao Yun
summary: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the heroes were fighting for hegemony, and the flames were everywhere. In the game, players played the role of Zhao Yun, a well-known general of the Three Kingdoms, and interpreted the story of his youth.

name: Bahnsen Knights
summary: Bahnsen Knights is a visual novel in the "Pixel Pulp" mystery series of stories inspired by both mid-20th century pulp fiction and ‘80s home computer graphics. The game features a world of religious fanatics, F5 tornadoes and Ford Sierras.

name: Bulletstorm VR
summary: In Bulletstorm VR, skillshots new and old, as well as the action-packed story, are recreated from the ground up to take advantage of VR.

name: Coloring Book Series Aquarium
summary: With 150 illustrations of marine friends, use various drawing tools to bring underwater life to vibrant colors.

name: Downhill Driver: Extreme Racing Simulator
summary: Xtreme downhill racing on dangerous tracks in powerful sports cars - set new records and take first place, racer!

name: Exiled
summary: Charlotte is missing. Decode an ancient language, investigate a mystery, and stay away from ancient monsters in this compact puzzle thriller.

name: Fling To The Finish
summary: In Fling to the Finish, teams of two players race through colorful, chaotic obstacle courses while tethered by a stretchy elastic rope.

name: Golf Guys: Complete Edition
summary: Face off against a dozen opponents in an ultimate golf battle royale, or invite friends to play in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!

name: Hunt Together
summary: Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits. Employ an array of items, triggers, and skills fit to your class to outsmart and defeat your foe - a terrifying Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter.

name: New Cycle
summary: Build a new civilization out of the chaos of an apocalyptic solar flare as you grow your House from a lone shelter to an industrial metropolis.

name: Rising Lords
summary: Rising Lords is a medieval turn-based strategy game with card and board game elements. Send your serfs to fight and die in your name... or let them prosper, and use them to your advantage!

name: The Pedestrian
summary: The Pedestrian is a 2.5D side scrolling puzzle platformer. You are The Pedestrian, and you can rearrange and reconnect public signs in order to explore and advance through each confounding environment.

name: The Sims 4 For Rent Expansion Pack
summary: Bring the neighbors together — literally — and experience multi-family lots as a tenant or property owner in The Sims 4 For Rent Expansion Pack.

name: Turnip Boy Robs a Bank
summary: Turnip Boy is back! This time he’s teaming up with the fearsome Pickled Gang to plan and execute the weirdest heist of all time. Shake down hostages, steal precious valuables, battle the fuzz, and use wacky tools bought off the dark web to move further into the vaults of the Botanical Bank.

name: Death Motel
summary: Death Motel is a first-person horror game where you investigate a motel with a history of paranormal activity.

name: Retrowave World
summary: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, chrome robot women, speeding 80s supercars... Welcome to Retrowave World!

name: Monster Truck Freestyle
summary: Featuring seven single player game modes and three multiplayer game modes, Monster Truck Freestyle gives players some some of the craziest monster truck driving experiences imaginable.

name: Ponpu
summary: Get ready to break some eggs in this frantic multiplayer party-game! Ponpu mixes classic gameplay with new crazy mechanics and a cool pop-art graphical style.

name: Graven
summary: A marriage between modern development tools and techniques with a stark late 90s aesthetic bring the action first person puzzler Graven to life in a dark yet distinct medieval fantasy experience.

name: Immortality
summary: Immortality is an interactive film trilogy from Sam Barlow, creator of Her Story. What happened to Marissa Marcel? Explore footage from her lost movies to solve the mystery.

name: Remains
summary: Remains - survival in outer space orbiting the planet. Explore the area. Find a way to restore oxygen. Create tools for your needs. Beware of the dangers of outer space. Build your shelter in orbit and try not to die!

name: The Legend of Steel Empire
summary: The Legend of Steel Empire is a modern remaster of the side-scrolling shoot-em-up video game that was originally released on Sega Genesis in 1992. The graphics have been improved in high definition and the controls have been re-worked for a better modern gaming experience.

name: Anomaly Agent
summary: Anomaly Agent is a cyberpunk action-platformer featuring combat, a time-bending story, quirky characters and a synthwave soundtrack! Punch or shoot through mobs of enemies, impact the story with your choices and stop the anomalies before the world plunges into chaos!

name: Rainbow Islands
publishers: Taito Acclaim Entertainment Ocean TDK Mediactive The Hit Squad Square Enix Mobile Rising Star Games Codemasters Bandai Hamster Corporation
franchises: Rainbow Islands Bubble Bobble Arcade Archives
summary: Taito's 1987 arcade follow-up to Bubble Bobble was widely ported, but always focused on two-player rainbow-casting action puzzle gameplay.

name: Storyblocks: The King
summary: In a charming medieval setting, players have the opportunity to carve their own path, choosing the next story block at each stage. With a library of journeys filled with intriguing variations of the main storyline, players are invited to unravel all possible outcomes.

name: Toribash Next
summary: Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game, developed by Nabi Studios. More players and fighting, weapons and blood, and ultimately - more fun.

name: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
developers: KOEI TECMO GAMES Akatsuki Games Inc.
summary: KOEI TECMO GAMES and Akatsuki Games present the latest title in the Atelier series, Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator.

name: Dead Man´s Diary
summary: It's a fictitious post-apocalyptic world, 15 years after the catastrophe, you have to leave your shelter and explore a world devoid of human life. On your own, you must find a way to survive.

name: Dream of the Star Haven
summary: Embark on a tranquil and enchanting odyssey with Dream of the Star Haven, a first-person platforming adventure that unfolds across ethereal islands in the sky. In this captivating dreamscape, you're invited to revel in a serene journey where threats are nonexistent, and your purpose is simply to traverse the celestial archipelago in search of stars.

name: Go Mecha Ball
summary: Switch between a gun-toting walking mech and an agile, rolling ball while blasting your way through four distinct worlds, filled with angry sons of glitches, relentless boss battles and increasingly wacky tools and obstacles!

name: Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal
summary: Hitman: Blood Money Reprisal is a comprehensive reworking of the stealth-action classic, refined for screens large and small - with a new Minimap, Instinct Mode, and gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series.

name: Onion Force
summary: Onion Force is a hybrid Tower Defense/Action Adventure game with 30 levels of mayhem! Use cunning and strategy to strengthen your team chosen from a diverse cast of characters, and hang on to your seat as you try to save the last king from his doom!

name: Starward Rogue
summary: Starward Rogue offers players an enthralling bullet hell twin-stick shooter experience as they navigate their way through the Megalith, a rogue-lite labyrinth embedded in the side of a star. In game, players take on the role of a "head in a mech" harvested from the neck of a Space Hydra.

name: Touhou Luna Nights
summary: In the 2D action-adventure game Touhou Luna Night, Sakuya can use the amazing time stop system in both platform-based exploration and intense combat.

name: Unforetold: Witchstone
summary: In the living world sandbox RPG Unforetold: Witchstone, explore a vibrant, reactive world where every action has consequences. Make a mark on the landscape through your choices, which ripple out into the environment and create a tailored, one-of-a-kind story.

name: BioGun: Clinical Trial
summary: Prologue version of the game BioGun. Get injected into the microscopic world. Face viral threats and winding corridors on your mission to save man’s best friend from the inside. Will you be the vaccine to save dog-kind from extinction?

name: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
summary: SEGA's hard-hitting, mini-game-packed, open-world action series returns with the eighth mainline game in the Yakuza / Ryu Ga Gotoku series.

name: Tekken 8
summary: Tekken returns in this explosive new entry in the franchise. It stars Jin Kazama as he battles Kazuya Mishima and attempts to end their conflict once and for all.

name: Counter Shooter Strike Zone
summary: Dive into the heart of intense combat in a gripping shooter experience where your skills are put to the ultimate test.

name: Cards Survivors
summary: Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, slay hordes of enemies, discover cards of immense power and survive as long as you can.

name: Outcast Tales: The First Journey
summary: A turn-based tactical roguelite where party members can bicker or forge bonds. Pick their classes AND personalities and brave the post-apocalyptic desert, fighting enemies and… each other's opinions?

name: Caves of Lore
summary: Caves of Lore is a turn-based, pixel-art, fantasy CRPG that combines elements of environmental exploration and character interaction with tactical, grid-based combat.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm
summary: Insurgency: Sandstorm focuses on a squad of characters as they face increasingly challenging chapters, from the invasion of Iraq in 2003 through the insurrection period and leading to the present day.

name: Teppo and The Secret Ancient City
summary: Teppo and The Secret Ancient City is an adventure where players take on the role of explorer Teppo, searching for the legendary stone fortress hidden in the Amazon jungle.

name: Clicker Guardians
summary: A true RPG clicker in which you need to loot, craft and refine your equipment to come out on top. Loyal guild members will help you along your mystical journey to defeat goblins, skeletons and adequately dressed frogs!

name: Retropolis dot.Line
summary: Retropolis dot.Line is a mixed-reality game where you can solve puzzles and decorate your home.

name: Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story
summary: In the single-player action adventure game Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story, explore the rich world of the Freljord, from its complete frozen tundra, to the warmth of the adventure found within.

name: Turret Rampage
summary: Defend humanity from underground monsters as the last standing turret! Force burrowers out of the ground with an artificial earthquake, capture elusive ghosts with silver shackles, and shatter alien bugs into pieces using powerful rockets!

name: 10 Dead Doves
developers: Duonix Studios Mark Byram II Sean-Michael Millard
summary: 10 Dead Doves is a single-player, fixed-perspective narrative horror set in the heart of Appalachia. Avoid strange noises, collect lifelines, and creep through a forest that seems to hate you. Will you discover why the birds drop dead -- or leave behind nothing but footprints?

name: 34Everlast
summary: 34Everlast is an action adventure game where your discoveries and actions unravel a complex and intertwined world of breathless action in a dying world.

name: Age of Empires Mobile
summary: Age of Empires Mobile is uniquely designed for mobile with visually stunning gameplay and unique play systems. Build your empire on the go!

name: Agent 64: Spies Never Die
summary: Agent 64: Spies Never Die is a retro FPS inspired by classic 90s console shooters. Enter a world of espionage and action, where you will explore various locales, accomplish varied objectives and fight against state-of-the-art 1997 enemy AI.

name: Airland World
summary: Airland World is a sandbox creation tool that brings players' game creation dreams to life, built using LUAU or C++ scripting. Enjoy realistically simulated vehicles (including trucks, tanks, planes, and helicopters) and traversal options (including swimming and skydiving), a variety of weapons as you allow players to be friends or foes, and a selection of game modes (casual, realistic, ultra-realistic) to make use of them all.

name: All Hail Temos
summary: All Hail Temos is a first-person action RPG in small hand-crafted open world. You are not a chosen one, but choose your own fate. Explore, fight, loot, trade, talk, quest, ride creatures, cast spells, or sneak and steal.

name: AlterBorn
summary: AlterBorn is a third-person survival action shooter set in a grim, lawless world corrupted by an antediluvian force. You're set to explore the Shattered Lands, while on a quest to venture into the heart of the curse that plagues you.

name: Angeline Era
summary: Angeline Era is an action RPG set in an esoteric land of Angels and Fae.

name: Apopia: Sugar Coated Tale
summary: Apopia: Sugar Coated Tale is a comedic adventure with dark mysteries. Help young girl Mai to find her way home. Progress by solving puzzles and outsmarting enemies in minigames.

name: Arctic Awakening
summary: Arctic Awakening is an episodic narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your AI drone for company as you journey to uncover the dark mysteries buried beneath the ice.

name: Arran: The Book of Heroes
summary: Arran is a hack and slash co-op dark fantasy adventure with some RPG elements. Bludgeon your way through enemies solo or along with up to 5 online players in the dark dungeons and barbaric lands of Arran. Loot unique equipment completing campaign quests where the final victory is only for the skilled.

name: Astlibra Gaiden: The Cave of Phantom Mist
summary: A side story for Astlibra starring a new female protagonist in a 20+ hour adventure! Take control of the baker's reclusive daughter to challenge randomly generated dungeons in a roguelike-style gameplay loop. Use all new magic attacks to beat up your enemies and relieve your stress.

name: Astral Throne
summary: Uncover the mystery of a Kingdom beset by a Falling Star's curse in this retro-inspired Roguelike SRPG. Build your party, recruit new allies, and synergize your team's skills for decisive victory.

name: AWAKEN: Astral Blade
summary: Weave your own story in this dark fairy tale. In the mysterious ancient ruins, Tania, a girl who has parasitized by an alien beast, tries to break through the fog and uncover the truth about her fate. Is there any chance of survival in the darkest place?

name: Bare Butt Boxing
summary: Bare Butt Boxing is a comically chaotic multiplayer "party brawler" fighting game. In clothing-optional, trap-ridden boxing rings, romp around in 6-player free-for-all brawls. Line up the perfect charged attack to send friends sailing or into other fighters!

name: Bear It
summary: Can you handle this un-bear-able fast-paced FPS? Bear It is a highly replayable roguelite parkour movement shooter for agile players. Use parkour on the environment and even on your enemies to traverse the Ark’s platforms quickly and efficiently. Be prepared for the unexpected!

name: Bellwright
summary: Establish and expand your own settlements, liberate the land and assist its villagers, and recruit others to your cause while learning more about a life you had to leave behind. Command your forces, prove your valor through combat, and cement yourself as the hero of your people.

name: Berserk Boy
summary: Berserk Boy is a vibrant, retro-inspired 2D action platformer that lets you… GO BERSERK!

name: Beyond the Ice Palace 2
summary: Assume the mantle of the 'Cursed King,' wielding the chains that once imprisoned you, now transformed into formidable weapons to vanquish your enemies and navigate the perilous terrain of your shattered kingdom.

name: Biwar Legends of Dragon Slayer
summary: Biwar Legend Of Dragon Slayer is an action-based puzzle game using special magic powers, including telekinesis.

name: Blazing Strike
summary: Blazing Strike is a 2D fighting game from developer RareBreed Makes Games which evokes the excitement and nostalgia of 2D pixel art genre pioneers while incorporating a unique games system with modern mechanics.

name: Boom Company
summary: Boom Company is a top-down, twin stick space-shooter with roguelite mechanics. Engage in frenetic combat. Complete missions for maximum profit. Upgrade vessels and weaponry with tech from rival factions.

name: Botanica
summary: Botanica is a short 2D side scrolling platformer game that immerses you in a world of sentient plants. Join the sprout, whose kind is often regarded as incredibly weak, on a journey to test its strength against Botanica and its governors.

name: Broken Roads
summary: Broken Roads provides a rich, engaging RPG narrative in which players make their way across a desolated future Australia. The game blends together traditional and all-new role-playing elements on top of a classless system offering nearly unlimited character development options.

name: Bubble Ghost Remake
summary: Guide a small ghost and its bubble through an enchanted castle full of dangers and challenges in this incredible remake of the popular classic "Bubble Ghost".

name: Burn
summary: Become a music idol in Burn, a pop star tragedy told over 16 endings that on replaying with different choices you can unlock the full story and endings.

name: Call of Duty [2024]
summary: Call of Duty [2024] is rumored to be a sequel to Black Ops: Cold War that takes place during the Gulf War.

name: Capital Command
summary: Take the helm of state-of-the-art warships as you fight epic space battles in the sandbox campaign of Capital Command. Upgrade and customize your ship, master the art of maneuvering, and use a blend of tactical prowess and heavy firepower to overcome a deadly threat.

name: Celebrity Life
summary: Happiness, success, fortune, fame, drama, scandals, and downfall. In Celebrity Life you'll experience them all. Take a journey through an immersive reflection of the peoples' lives we follow & talk about. The Celebrities! Now at last you can become one. Don't dream your life, live your dream.

name: Chicken Police: Into The Hive
summary: Gather clues, solve puzzles, and interrogate suspects as you work to uncover a world-shattering conspiracy in this film noir detective game.

name: Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition
summary: Hit JRPG dungeon crawler returns, remastered! As a first year student at Particus Academy, you must study hard and train even harder. Build up a cohort of students, educate them in the art of evasion and train them in the fundamentals of combat. Select the right harmony of classes, skills, and courses for your students, to give them the perfect edge over the challenging dungeons.

name: Commandos: Origins
summary: ALARM! You have been selected for a mission which will shape the fate of the entire world. Witness the very beginning of the legendary elite WWII force in Commandos: Origins. This sequel to the Commandos series brings you right back to the foundation of the real-time tactics genre.

name: Contract Killer
summary: Contract Killer is a 2.5D co-op beat ‘em up starring a diverse cast of angry writing utensils. Punch, snap, and clap your way through baddies and bosses in a comical campaign, clash against your friends, or survive endless swarms of corporate goons!

name: Cook, Serve, Delicious: Re-Mustard!
summary: The million-selling cooking sim is BACK in this all new re-imagining of a classic! An all new campaign, expanded music, new foods and art, and new gameplay modes round out a celebration of the ten year anniversary of this massive series.

name: Core Devourer
summary: Hunt down huge hordes of droids, absorb their cores and become the strongest cybernetic being.

name: Coven
summary: Coven is a hyper violent, fast-paced FPS -- destroy your enemies and eat their flesh! Utilize an explosive mix of early modern period weaponry and magic as you explore villages, temples, forests and cities to uncover the secrets of the old gods across a variety of scenarios.

name: Crashlands 2
summary: Slap your way across a vibrant world where interstellar friendships are the key to your survival. Befriend eccentric aliens, craft bizarre weaponry, and stick it to the man in this sequel to the award-winning open world crafting RPG Crashlands.

name: Critter Crops
summary: Sylvie is a young witch, banished from home for her magic. Grow magical crops, unlock the mysteries of Mutter Island, and build a new home for an aspiring witch and her friends.

name: Crypt Custodian
summary: Crypt Custodian is a charming metroidvania about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto- a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworlds janitor... FOREVER! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.

name: Curve Fever
summary: Curve Fever is a high-energy, multiplayer snake game with powers. Survive each round and battle-it-out online against opponents, utilizing your own customized ship to win. Climb the ranked ladder and level up, earning new powers with each new level!

name: Dark and Deep
summary: A conspiracy podcast drags you into a world of mystery and terror. Reveal secrets and horrors with mystical frames given to you by a strange observer. Dark and Deep is a first person cosmic horror game with a focus on puzzles and exploration.

name: DC: Dark Legion
summary: Build up your base, level up your superpowers and equipment, and lead a squad of your favorite DC characters against the darkness.

name: Dead Season
summary: Guide a group of unprepared strangers in their struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse, in Dead Season, a turn-based tactics game. Strategize to endure against relentless undead hordes, but beware, noise attracts more danger. Can you escape the outbreak's grip?

name: Deathless
summary: Deathless - a cooperative Action Roguelite game. Battle with friends against endless waves of enemies! Intense fights and tough choices await as each minute decides your fate.

name: Deck of Souls
summary: A souls-like deck-building roguelike game with RPG elements and dungeon delving in a dark fantasy setting. Pick a class, select a style and improve upon it by leveling your stats and improving your deck. Fight, die, progress, repeat.

name: Demeo Battles
summary: Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players. Choose your champion, assemble an army of monstrous minions, and fight for glory in 1v1 and 2v2 turn-based action.

name: Demon's Mirror
summary: Demon's Mirror is a roguelike deckbuilder combined with a strategic match-3 battler. Use cards to attack and defend against the enemy, manipulate tiles on the board, and gain ever increasing powers as you traverse into a world filled with your worst nightmares.

name: dev_hell
summary: Join the tech industry and contribute to the downfall of society in this first-person roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Diablo: The Roleplaying Game
summary: Diablo: The Roleplaying Game features an original core engine inspired by Diablo IV, the blockbuster that pioneers new ground for open-world, non-linear exploration.

name: Disco Samurai
summary: Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!

name: Divine Duel
summary: Enter the magical world of Evergarden, take on the role of a powerful deity, and face off in spectacular duels against your peers in the fast-paced, highly competitive online 2-player VR fighting game Divine Duel.

name: DoubleShake
summary: Grab, shake, throw, and kick to save your islands from total chaos in this action-packed blast-to-the-past 2.5D Platformer inspired by some of our favorite 5th generation games!

name: Duel Corp
summary: Duel Corp. is an action RPG designed to be played alone or with a friend. It features an unrestricted class and AI system with fluid and challenging direction-based combat. Discover epic items, hidden secrets, unique skills and talents in a procedurally generated retro fantasy world.

name: Dustgrave
summary: Embark on an epic journey, enjoying complete freedom in a dynamic sandbox RPG. The world and its inhabitants will witness your deeds and react accordingly, adapting the narrative to your choices and delivering a truly unique and free experience.

name: Dystopika
summary: Dystopika is a chill cyberpunk city-builder of dystopian dreams (or nightmares). No goals, no stress, no objectives. Just your imagination.

name: Earth From Another Sun
summary: Earth From Another Sun is an open-world galactic domination sandbox where you fight alongside the armies you command both on planets and in space! Explore the galaxy, found and grow your empire, build your trade network, fight alongside the armies you command, and conquer the galaxy!

name: Earthless
summary: EARTHLESS is a sci-fi, roguelike deckbuilder where humankind has been thrust into the cosmic wind on a fleet of starships captained by you. To find a new home, you must draw your own path through the stars and play the hand you’re dealt. You are our hope in the darkness.

name: Echoes of the Plum Grove
summary: A new life awaits you in Honeywood! Build a thriving farming community that will last generations in this cozy farm simulator. Farm, socialize, make friends, cook, craft, forage, and uncover the secrets of the island! And if someone doesn’t want to be friends? There are always other means.

name: Empire of the Ants
summary: Embark on a fantastic journey through the infinitely small and lead your colony to a hopeful horizon

name: Escape Simulator VR
summary: Venture into captivating escape rooms solo or in an online co-op with up to 8 players (optimal 2-3). Pick up and examine everything, break objects, solve locks, and decipher puzzles to escape! After finishing the main game, watch for free content updates and explore 3000+ community-made rooms.

name: Etheria: Restart
summary: Etheria: Restart is a turn-based action-RPG game set in the neo-contemporary virtual city Etheria. You, a Hyper-Linker, will fight side by side with Animus against virus invasions and explore hidden stories.

name: Everdeep Aurora
summary: Everdeep Aurora is 2D exploration adventure game which follows a kitten searching for her missing mother.

name: Evotinction
summary: Evotinction is a third person stealth game featuring unique hacking mechanics. A variety of hacking skills, environment devices and gadgets provide rich emergent gameplay.

name: Exophobia
summary: Exophobia is a retro-inspired first person shooter with fast-paced combat. You wake up to find yourself alone in a human spaceship infested with hostile alien soldiers.

name: Fallout 4
summary: Welcome to the world of Fallout 4, the ambitious fourth game in the apocalyptic RPG saga. Only you can rebuild and determine the fate of the Wasteland. Do whatever you want in a massive open world with hundreds of locations, characters, and quests.

name: Farm Manager World
summary: Dive into the agricultural life with Farm Manager World! Manage your own farm across vibrant global locations, cultivate exotic crops, and build your agribusiness empire. Welcome to sustainable farming at its finest.

name: Final Fury
summary: Enter a new era of combat in FINAL FURY, a VR fighting game inspired by the golden age of arcade fighters.

name: Fishkeeper
summary: In Fishkeeper, become a professional aquarist and completely immerse yourself in the fish world! Take care of multiple aquariums by providing fish and other animals with food, suitable conditions and nice company.

name: Forever Skies
summary: In Forever Skies, you play a scientist exploring what remains of an Earth that was largely destroyed in a massive ecological disaster.

name: Fretless: The Wrath of Riffson
summary: In this turned-based RPG, wield powerful legendary instruments, gather mighty riff attacks and save the land from Rick Riffson's devilish goons and musical hybrid monsters!

name: G.I. Joe: Wrath of Cobra
summary: Maple Powered Games and Freedom Games bring you an action-packed fighting game featuring the G.I. Joe team as well as Cobra.

name: Genopanic
summary: Jump into Genopanic, a wild (NOT)metroidvania ride! Wield a plasma cutter, boot up virtual doggo LAIK, outsmart sly cat-girl AI VOLGA - the station's troublemaker, unravel the Dark Matter enigma, and explore DNA experiments in a cosmic adventure!

name: Glitched
summary: When a glitch appears in the video game world of Soren, an NPC named Gus becomes aware of you -- the player. Travel together to solve the mystery of the glitch and save Gus's friends, hometown, and digital world.

name: God of Riffs: Battle for The Metalverse
summary: God of Riffs: Battle for the Metalverse is an epic, adrenaline pumping, heavy metal game in VR that’s like a hard rock cover come to life!

name: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
summary: Swing, bounce, and wall run through Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines, a 2D pixel-art platformer.

name: Grifford Academy
summary: Join Erika and friends in an empowering coming-of-age turn-based RPG as they journey into a mystical book realm. Equip unique items and tailor your party’s abilities to battle vicious monsters. Test the strength of friendship, teamwork and personal growth as the secrets of the book unfold.

name: Grit
summary: Grit is a Wild West Battle Royale where players test their merit against 99 other opponents in the ultimate showdown.

name: Guild of Rogues
summary: Guild of Rogues is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with Autobattler elements. Strategically build your team of minions to create amazing synergies and defeat all enemies!

name: Hammer of Virtue
summary: Hammer of Virtue is a skill-based action game that drops you into a futuristic world where terrorist organizations deploy cybernetically-enhanced, armored animals to reap chaos. Fight through more than 20 stages featuring legions of enemies and fully destructible environments.

name: Harry Potter: Magic Awakened
summary: Harry Potter: Magic Awakened blends card collection and MMORPG elements in an all-new adventure that takes players to Hogwarts. As a first-year student, players will take on the challenges of their magical education, explore the castle grounds, play Quidditch, and even duel other witches and wizards.

name: He Who Watches
summary: Manipulate gravity, walk on walls, and use your magical arrow to solve mind-bending puzzles in this grid-based dungeon puzzler. Decipher the secrets of the canvas and search for the mythos known as He Who Watches in this continuation of the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022 winning entry.

name: Hell Galaxy
summary: Hell Galaxy has the fusion of space battles, eerie specters, and daunting titans. The gameplay offers a mix of action, horror, and space exploration. Engage in dynamic mining, looting, and crafting while traversing an RPG-influenced cosmos.

name: Heroes of Forever
summary: Heroes of Forever is an arcade VR first-person shooter developed by Lucky Mountain Games. Players travel across time and space to dispatch and take down a corruption that's seeping across the dimension.

name: Hollowbody
summary: In Hollowbody, you are an unlicensed Shipper working for an infamous ring of black market freelancers. Alone, stranded, and with limited resources at your disposal you'll have to push your way through the dangerous zone, solve environmental puzzles, manage resources and fight for your life.

name: Homeworld: Vast Reaches
summary: Homeworld: Vast Reaches allows you to take control of a fleet of spaceships and engage in exciting combat against a mysterious, new foe.

name: Horizon: Forbidden West - Burning Shores
summary: The Burning Shores DLC for Horizon: Forbidden West takes Aloy to a volcanic region south of the Tenakth Clan Land, including the ruins of Los Angeles, as she pursues a sinister new threat.

name: I Need Space
summary: Travel across the universe with your nebulous companion the Cosmicat, together rewriting stars, revitalizing planets, and discovering the cosmic truth behind the apocalypse.

name: Industry Giant 4.0
summary: Build an industrial empire from scratch in Industry Giant 4.0. Produce goods, build up your industries, construct transportation networks, plan production, manage finances, and navigate global events. Become the next business mogul and write history!

name: Into the Dead 3
summary: Roughly 10 years have passed since the events of Into the Dead 2. Into the Dead 3 features more heart-pounding missions, powerful weapons, deeper lore, and the addition of new strategic and tactical aspects.

name: Island of Winds
summary: Island of Winds is a story-driven adventure game set in 17th century Iceland in which players take control of a magic-wielder on a journey through a magical world teeming with rich environments and legendary creatures inspired by Icelandic folklore.

name: JAWS Pinball
summary: JAWS Pinball is fitted with brand-new mechanical features inspired by iconic movie moments powered by state-of-the-art technology. Players embody Quint and grab their harpoons to help Amity Island from disaster and save the Fourth of July.

name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
summary: Ream up with your friends to send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld.

name: Kaku: Ancient Seal
summary: Kaku: Ancient Seal is an open-world action-adventure fantasy game that lets players navigate their own path through a mysterious continent full of strange creatures, ancient ruins, and unique tribes. Play Kaku an young child, who’s tasked with going on a journey across a sprawling continent.

name: Keep Those Bugs Away From the Bomb
summary: Keep Those Bugs Away From The Bomb (originally known as B.I.O.T.A. Swarm) is your ticket to a fast-paced bullet-hell adventure with heaps upon heaps of weapons, upgrades and unlocks. Fight your way through waves of hideous enemies, rescue survivors, expand your roster of playable characters, add new weapons, and skills to your arsenal, and most importantly, where you’ll KEEP… THOSE BUGS… AWAY… FROM

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2
summary: Diving back into the heart-pounding world of 15th Century Bohemia (Central Europe), Kingdom Come: Deliverance II picks up where its predecessor left off, thrusting players into the shoes of Henry, the steadfast son of a blacksmith, embroiled in a tumultuous tale of vengeance, betrayal, and self-discovery.

name: Kingpin: Reloaded
summary: The classic 1999 shooter is back! Kingpin: Reloaded is a remastered, enhanced version of the crime-themed first-person shooter developed and published by 3D Realms and Interplay.

name: Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino
summary: Stranded on an island -- Adashino Island -- the fox and the frog follow the distant lights shining on their dark surroundings. Where will this lead them? Find out in Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino, a 3D adventure game with a Japanese-inspired atmosphere.

name: Kromlech
summary: Embark on a journey in this dark fantasy action-adventure game to find out why the tapestry of the world is suddenly unraveling itself and even the gods themselves seem powerless to stop it. Sharpen your blade, gather your companions, and prepare to make the last stand as the world around you burns.

name: Laser Dance
summary: Laser Dance is a mixed-reality game that turns your living room into a laser obstacle course. Get ready to dance, dodge, and crawl your way to victory in this party game.

name: Let Me Out
summary: LET ME OUT - is a psychological horror with a depressing mood. The life of the main character lies in your hands. Help him get out of his difficult condition or try the opposite.

name: Level Zero: Extraction
summary: Level Zero is a tactical online multiplayer first-person horror game where the first team of players, represented by survivors, must repair the space station's light controls and restore power to eliminate the hostile creatures.

name: Lifeguard Simulator
summary: Keep the bay safe and protect sunbathers in Lifeguard Simulator. Watch the beach, patrol the area, help and keep safety, but also solve the criminal intrigue.

name: Little Nightmares III
summary: Little Nightmares III is a sequel to the popular franchise of action-adventure games which have stealth and exploration elements.

name: Lost Twins 2
summary: This cute puzzle game combines a heartfelt story with Studio Ghibli inspired graphics. Players follow Abi and Ben as they move across platforms, swap tiles to create paths, and all sorts else on their journey back home.

name: Madison VR
summary: MADiSON VR is an adaptation of 2022's MADiSON psychological horror game, designed specifically for VR hardware, giving players a unique game experience.

name: Magin: The Rat Project Stories
summary: Magin is a combination of a narrative-driven adventure game with a deck-building card combat system. The nonlinear plot, comic book aesthetics, full voice over and game mechanics are all tightly attached to the represented world in a unique fantasy setting.

name: Mannequin
summary: Play as alien Mannequins and set up deadly ambushes by posing as humans frozen in time in this asymmetrical VR game.

name: Mars Horizon 2: The Search for Life
summary: Lead your space agency in The Search for Life in this authentic strategy simulation game. Investigate the solar system and collect evidence of life. Manage base building, rocket designing, launches, staff, and mission planning to Mars and beyond, leading the way in the future of space exploration.

name: Maximum Football
summary: Maximum Football is a free-to-play football simulation, offering a premium experience to fans far and wide at no cost.

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans
summary: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS follows a Star of Clan Smoke Jaguar warriors during Operation REVIVAL, a full-scale invasion of the Inner Sphere. Armed with an arsenal of cutting-edge BattleMechs, meticulously designed maps and missions deliver immersive and intricate tactical gameplay and combat experiences.

name: Memory Lost
summary: Memory Lost is a story-driven action shooter, the battles in which are built around the mechanics of mind capturing and moving into the enemy's body.

name: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater
summary: A remake of MGS3, Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater promises to be a faithful retelling of the original game, including implementing the original voice acting featuring David Hayter.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024
summary: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 expands on the original game's complex flight model with all-new career missions, including aerial fire fighting, search and rescue, cargo transporting, air racing, experimental flight, and more.

name: MindXcope
summary: MindXcope is a surreal VR rogue-lite action game. Enter a bizarre world originates from people's daily struggles to embark on an unexpected adventure. Gain your weapons, hack and slash your way through scenes symbolizing your dilemmas, eliminate your nightmares and uncover the secrets.

name: Mists of Noyah
summary: Hunt by day, be hunted by night! Mists of Noyah is a cooperative survival game with many RPG elements. Fight against bizarre monsters that will terrorize the night! Strengthen your base by rescuing great survivors around the world and defeating bosses.

name: Montezuma’s Revenge: The 40th Anniversary Edition
summary: In this remake of the 1983 platformer Montezuma’s Revenge, players follow Pedro the explorer or his younger sister Rosita on an expedition for glory into the deadly depths of Montezuma’s tomb.

name: Mortal Rite
summary: Mortal Rite is a soulslike third-person, action RPG which aims to breathe new life into the roguelite and dungeon crawler genres. The game focuses on characters with unique abilities and up to 5 player Co-Op.

name: My Lovely Empress
summary: My Lovely Empress is a empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology. As the Emperor of the Crimson Empire, you will build relations with neighboring rulers, balance internal factions, and ensure the prosperity of your people, all before you reap their souls to resurrect your beloved empress.

name: NCSoft "LLL" Project
summary: LLL is an online co-op third-person shooter game featuring epic sci-fi warfare across a 30km stretch of open-world warzone.

name: Neva
summary: Neva tells the moving tale of a young woman and her lifelong bond with a magnificent wolf as they embark on a thrilling adventure through a rapidly dying world.

name: NIMRODS: GunCraft Survivor
summary: Assemble a limitless arsenal in this survive-em-up roguelite shooter. As a Gun Manufacturer's testing force, your mission is simple: test the latest gun tech and scavenge alien planets. Collect insane weapon parts to invent crazy guns that slay thousands. You may not survive, but your guns will!

name: No Longer Human
summary: No Longer Human is a high-energy cybergoth action fvck-em-up with expressive, freeform combat that encourages aggressive, stylish play.

name: Northwind
summary: Northwind is a challenging rogue-lite deckbuilding where players hunt ferocious monsters, build your village, upgrade new tools, and encounter stronger foes. Play as one of the two renowned mercenaries in an ice-cold universe.

name: Nura's Wish
summary: Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.

name: Off The Grid
summary: Developed in collaboration with Neill Blomkamp, Off The Grid is a dystopian Battle Royale designed to evolve the genre through strong emphasis on narrative progression. Players fight in both PvP skirmishes and PvE storyline missions using the same map inhabited by other players in real time.

name: On Your Tail
summary: On Your Tail is a narrative life sim game that takes you to the seaside village of Borgo Marina. In On Your Tail, uncover the mysteries, unmask the thief menacing the town, go fishing, and more.

name: Outbound
summary: Build your own home on wheels and live sustainably off-grid. Craft workstations and power supplies, source energy from the sun, wind, or water, upgrade and customize your vehicle, grow crops, automate your production, and explore a colorful world.

name: Paleophage
summary: Paleophage is a third-person dinosaur survival horror game set in an urban resort.

name: Passageway of the Ancients
summary: Inspired by classic CRPGs from the ’90s and early 2000s, Passageway of the Ancients transports players to the world of Aieryon – the galaxy’s sole remaining magical planet – where they explore the city of Ithgar to solve their parents’ murder.

name: Peripeteia
summary: Peripeteia mixes shooter, stealth and RPG mechanics, played in first-and-third-person perspective. You will be forced to use your wits, tact, and raw violent nature to complete tasks shrouded in conspiracy and mystery.

name: Pirates Republic
summary: Fight dangerous battles on the high seas with Pirates Republic (formerly known as Pirate’s Dynasty), grab your friends and collect valuable booty in multiplayer mode and build your stronghold. Together with your crew you will rule the huge procedurally generated world as a notorious buccaneer.

name: Play Rough
summary: Play Rough is a roleplaying game set in the surreal, post-apocalyptic wasteland of what was once California. It's a place where humans live side-by-side with living cartoons, twisted abominations of ink and flesh, and... Clowns...?

name: Prim
summary: Prim is a hand-drawn 2D point-and-click adventure game in which you play as Death's daughter. Prim has a dream where a human boy cries out for her help. But her father has forbidden her to enter the Land of the Living. When Prim finds a way to travel to Earth, it turns out her dad has been right all along!

name: Project L.3.3.T.
summary: Project L.3.3.T. is a first-person PvEvP hardcore tactical extraction shooter that puts players in the shoes of an elite mercenary from the L.3.3.T. agency. Engage in high-stakes battles against both NPCs and rival players to secure precious loot in a world transformed by alien technology. Venture into hostile, anomaly-ridden environments, risking all your gear to collect, secure, and extract artifacts. But be wary: death during the expedition means losing everything.

name: Project O.R.C.S.
summary: Project O.R.C.S. is a multiplayer Collaborative Storytelling RPG where you and your friends play together to craft unique worlds, tell epic stories, and embark upon quests that are as dynamic as your group.

name: Psychotic Bathtub - The Story of an Escalating Mind. And Ducks.
summary: Psychotic Bathtub - The Story of an Escalating Mind. And Ducks. is a multi-linear, fictionalized narrative game that features Ophelia, a woman suffering from a psychotic disorder.

name: Puzzles for Clef
summary: Puzzles for Clef is a relaxing adventure game focused on the eponymous heroine, Clef. Following a letter from her sister, Cres, our bunny friend Clef journeys to the island of her ancestors, to undertake a treasure hunt.

name: R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos
summary: R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos combines the two strategy spin-offs in the seminal sci-fi shooter series (also known as R-Type Command) with an enhanced HD makeover. To gain an advantage in battle with alien forces, you will scout out enemies and prepare the deployment and formation of your unit to fight.

name: Ran: Lost Islands
summary: Ran: Lost Islands is an online medieval battle royale that thrusts 100 players into do or die combat and survival.

name: Realm of Ink
summary: Realm of Ink is an Ink-style action Roguelite game. The heroine, Red, unexpectedly discovers she is just a fictional character within the short story collection Realm of Ink when hunting the Fox. Only by unlocking the dark secrets will she defy her own destined path.

name: Renaine
summary: Renaine is a fast paced platformer inspired by fighting games. Pull stylish combos as you guide Aine, the Phoenix Knight, on her eternal quest to save the kingdom she loves.

name: Republic of Pirates
summary: Establish and grow a pirate utopia during the Golden Age of Piracy. Create a resource-based economy, engage in real-time naval combat, and navigate diplomatic relationships with rival powers. Explore the far reaches of the Caribbean in search of the ultimate fortune and glory…

name: RF Online Next
summary: The battles in RF ONLINE NEXT are based on science-fiction motifs and provide a unique combat experience compared to other fantasy games. Combatants can choose one of six unique biosuits to enjoy high-octane, skill-based battles. Players can also freely switch between biosuits based on the battle situation. The game also features the ability to summon giant robots to assist in battles or to pilot it into battle.

name: Riven [Remake]
summary: This is a remake of the classic second chapter in the atmospheric puzzle adventure game series Myst.

name: Robots at Midnight
summary: Robots at Midnight will have you embracing intense combat, unravelling deep lore, and discovering what it means to be human. In this Action RPG, explore the world of Yob as Zoe, a scrappy hero searching for her past and protecting her future.

name: Rogue North
summary: Rogue North is an intense survival rogue-lite that has you fear every bullet. Attempt to escape from enemy forces in Canada during one of the worst winters in history. Prepare accordingly, there's a long walk ahead of you.

name: Roman Sands RE:Build
summary: Roman Sands RE:Build is a delirium-charged journey into apocalypse which collides through visual novel, adventure, puzzle solving, horror, and survival simulation.

name: Roots of Pacha
summary: In Roots of Pacha, join up with your friends to create a thriving community and develop the technologies that changed the ancient world. Discover crops, befriend animals, become the first farmer, participate in festivals, and find love to grow your legacy.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
summary: Through the power of imagination, the babies transport Tommy's house into a video game world full of action, excitement, and adventure!

name: Rusty Rabbit
summary: Rusty Rabbit is a 2.5D action sidescroller that allows players to take control of Stamp, a rabbit living among the giant ruins of a frozen world abandoned by humanity.

name: Sand and Hand
summary: Sand and Hand is a sand artistry and sculpture experience in VR.

name: Seafrog
summary: Seafrog (originally announced as Deadog) sees you take on the role of a skateboarding frog who also happens to be a sailor. Here you’ll find your ship stuck in a ship graveyard where you must traverse the world using sweet skateboarding tricks along the way.

name: Shadowman: Darque Legacy
summary: Stand up against horrifying enemies that threaten the land of the living with melee combat. Cross between the living realm and the Deadside dark realm to become the hero of the dark and overcome obstacles to slay foes in your path.

name: shapez 2
summary: Shapez 2 is a challenging but easy-to-learn factory building game. Automate the processing of geometric shapes, build massive factories and optimize them to solve increasingly complex logistics and automation tasks.

name: Silent Hill 2 Remake
summary: Silent Hill 2 is a remake of the 2001 psychological horror game. Reunite with main protagonist James Sunderland following a mysterious letter from his late wife, Mary, and search for clues in the terrifying namesake town, teeming with nightmarish monsters.

name: Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death
summary: Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death is a comedy hack 'n slash that takes players on a quest for The Legendary Villain-Beating Artifact.

name: Slayaway Camp 2: Netflix & Kill
summary: Leave no survivors. In this sequel, you're Skullface, a killer stuck inside a retro horror movie catalog — solve puzzles, stalk victims and get stabby.

name: Snow Plowing Simulator
summary: Nobody likes winter when they get up in the morning and have to clear snow in the entire neighborhood. What if we tell you that clearing snow can be relaxing? Just real snow chill! PS. Persistent ones will learn about the fascinating history of a sleepy town lost somewhere in the high mountains...

name: Solarpunk
summary: Solarpunk is a survival game in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and hop on your airship to explore distant islands in the sky.

name: Sophia the Traveler
summary: Sophia the Traveler is a visual novel about roaming the Italian city of Venice.

name: Soup Pot
summary: Soup Pot is a cooking game framed around doing live streams of your cooking. Players will use beautifully stylized 3D renders of ingredients to create over 100 mouth-watering recipes.

name: Space Chef
summary: Space Chef is a 2D "open-galaxy" action adventure combining gun-blasting action with fun cooking, crazy crafting and anything but your usual farming. Explore a vast universe that is different each playthrough. Bring a friend on your delicious adventures with couch co-op!

name: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To
summary: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To is an action-puzzle game set in a lush, narrative-driven world of witchy demons.

name: Sports: Renovations
summary: Give sports facilities a second life in this relaxing first-person simulator! Restore the glory of old gyms, courts and pitches as you try to make enough money to save your hometown basketball court.

name: Star Trucker
summary: Haul cargo, trade salvage and keep your space suit close as you search for fame and fortune among the stars in a game that puts an interstellar twist on the truck sim genre.

name: SteamDolls: Order of Chaos
summary: SteamDolls is a steampunk inspired action-adventure game with a grimy touch of brutality.

name: Steel Seed
summary: Steel Seed is an action-stealth adventure in which the last survivors of Earth, being kept safe underground by AI machines following mankind's own near-destruction of the planet, must defend themselves against a new threat.

name: StormEdge
summary: Dodge enemies' attacks, activate lethal traps, and customize your hero! Brace yourself for the dangerous Elemental Storms that will put your skills to the test.

name: Stumble Guys
summary: Stumble Guys is an online battle royale party game! Race with up to 32 players online dashing through chaotic obstacle courses. Run, jump and dash to the finish line until the best player takes the crown!

name: SunnySide
summary: You’ve purchased your first plot of land in an aging post town in the heart of the Japanese countryside. Now, it’s up to you to create a homestead to be proud of. Spend time getting to know the residents of SunnySide -- old and new -- all while balancing your newfound farm life.

name: Super Fantasy Kingdom
summary: A roguelite city builder set in a relaxing fantasy world. Explore and rebuild your kingdom to bring it back to its former glory. Defeat hordes of monsters with a unique team of defenders. Harvest, build, mine, cook, brew, feed, and grow. But be prepared to watch it all burn!

name: Survival: Fountain of Youth
summary: Survival: Fountain of Youth is a single-player survival game set in the Caribbean islands in the 16th-century. After surviving a shipwreck and waking on the shores of an uninhabited tropical island, search these strange surroundings for the rest of de Leon’s crew, relying on wits and skill to outlast the elements.

name: Sushi Ben VR
summary: Sushi Ben VR is a slice of life sim where you play as a customer to a sushi bar that's going out of business and it's up to you to save it! The player’s goal is to convince non-player characters to eat with them at the sushi bar, with the hopes that they will become regular customers.

name: SWORN
summary: SWORN is a 1-4 player co-op action rogue-like. Explore and reclaim a fallen Camelot from the reign of a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the round table.

name: Synth Beasts
summary: Capture and harness powerful beasts to do combat and traverse the world in this monster taming action-adventure. Unravel the mystery of your existence by exploring a sinister island laboratory and putting an end to the creation of the Synth Beasts.

name: Tameless
summary: Help a captured creature escape imprisonment in Tameless, an exciting hack-and-slash adventure! Venture through dangerous areas while fighting off the terrible army of Kobolds. Recruit new allies, increase security at your headquarters, and upgrade your weapons in preparation for the great escape.

name: Teahouse of Souls
summary: “Teahouse of Souls” is a VR game that grows the seeds of emotions in a fairytale-like space and comforts the soul by making tea with harvested crops.

name: Tempest Rising
summary: Classic RTS action meets modern production and performance in Tempest Rising, a base-building real-time strategy game set in a modern day alternative history war scenario.

name: Thank Goodness You're Here!
summary: Thank Goodness You're Here! is an absurd comedy slapformer set in the bizarre Northern English town of Barnsworth. As a traveling salesman, take the time to see the sights and meet the locals, who are very eager to give you a series of increasingly odd jobs…

name: The Bearer & The Last Flame
summary: The Bearer & The Last Flame is a dark fantasy action adventure. In a realm where death is rampant, a living soul has received his commission, to carry the last flame and light the lands of the night, the dark lands.

name: The Cabbage Effect
summary: A cartoon-pop-surrealistic twin-stick shooter on procedurally generated stages that takes place in an apocalyptic narrative.

name: The Crimson Maid
summary: As a secret celestial curse takes hold of his father, a young cleric finds himself enraptured by the charms of a strikingly beautiful maid. A period drama that combines romance and murder mystery, with a dash of supernatural.

name: The Dead Await
summary: Build your deck and try to survive in The Dead Await, a deck-building RPG set during a zombie apocalypse. As one of many survivors, set out across the desolate world, discover the truth about the outbreak, and rebuild human civilization - or die trying.

name: The Devil Within: Satgat
summary: Journey through an interconnected world as a fierce warrior on a mission to save a decaying world in the 2.5D stylish action adventure game The Devil Within: Satgat.

name: The Guy VR
summary: A first person puzzle game where you'll have to find the way out of your own dreams using objects and tools that you'll obtain during a nap. Formerly known as Suicide Guy VR.

name: The Last Alchemist
summary: The Last Alchemist is a wondrous Alchemy Management game about the blazing pursuit of science in a world of superstition.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria
franchises: J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-Earth (Lord of the Rings)
summary: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is a survival crafting game set in the Fourth Age of Middle-earth. It follows the Dwarves of Middle-earth as they embark on an original adventure to reclaim and restore their Dwarven homeland of Moria.

name: The Mechanical World of Dr. Gearbox
summary: In the unconventional turn-based RPG The Mechanical World of Dr. Gearbox, unravel the forgotten mysteries of an aging adventurer by retracing his steps across four distinct environments.

name: The Plucky Squire
summary: The Plucky Squire follows the magical adventures of Jot and his companions -- storybook characters who discover a three-dimensional world outside the pages of their book. They must jump between 2D & 3D realms to save their friends in this charming action-adventure.

name: The Star Named EOS
summary: Capture photos and step back in time to experience the moments held within them in The Star Named EOS. Solve a variety of puzzles to help a young photographer uncover the truth about his mother’s disappearance and rediscover the beauty that is to be found in the world.

name: The Touhou Empires
summary: Touhou meets real-time warfare! Explore maps, gather resources, and build your army! Become the conqueror of Gensokyo!

name: The Witch of Fern Island
summary: The Witch of Fern Island is a game about a young girl who wants to become a real witch. Immerse yourself in the history of the island and get to know its inhabitants. It's time to find your place in the world.

name: Thief Simulator 2
summary: The door to your robber’s career is waiting! Just crowbar the lock off and force your way through the threshold. Learn skills, collect tools and become a master of the thieving trade!

name: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
summary: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown is a complex city-building game elevated with a real-time strategy twist for up to four players. The fate of the kingdom weighs heavily based on the choices you make.

name: Timeless Heart VR
summary: Timeless heart VR is an action VR roguelite game, As the second work of Timeless Stories series, this work further simplifies and enriches the unique sword skill system of the series. Advancing in the unknown labyrinth with Lycanea, and break through this blockade from fate!

name: Tiny Glade
summary: Tiny Glade is a peaceful building game with no management or combat. Instead, you merely need to focus on transforming forgotten meadows into lovely castle dioramas.

name: To The Stars
summary: To the Stars is a tactical roguelike deck-builder where you surf a procedurally generated sea of stars while recruiting a group of quirky, yet talented alien crewmates. Utilize their distinct abilities to effectively manage the voyages ahead and while ensuring guests have a great time aboard your spaceship.

name: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Mobile
summary: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Mobile is a competitive multiplayer, first-person tactical shooter which lets gamers engage in tactical combat scenarios anywhere they go. Explore a diverse roster of Operators and destructible environments in classic maps like Bank and Border.

name: Tormented Souls II
summary: Caroline Walker is back in an award-winning classic survival horror sequel. Explore nightmarish locations, confront terrifying creatures, and try to rescue your cursed sister.

name: Towerborne
summary: Fight alongside your friends in a fantastical world from the makers of the Banner Saga franchise.

name: Toxic Crusaders [2023]
summary: The hottest heroes of 1991 return for a radical, radioactive romp for a new era, featuring awesome action, crushing combos and more toxic waste than you'll know what to do with! Battle across seven disgusting levels rendered in vibrant pixel art as you defend Tromaville from hordes of Radiation Rangers, mutated thugs and zombie chickens.

name: Train Valley World
summary: Train Valley World is a transport simulation game about building and managing efficient railway networks. Lay tracks, dispatch trains and deliver goods across the globe to solve intricate logistics puzzles with limited resources. Become a master tycoon – solo or in online multiplayer!

name: Tricky Madness
summary: Tricky Madness is an arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080. Race down the mountain, explore secret areas, catch big air and perform Uber tricks.

name: Turbo Force
summary: Anti-gravity racing game with online competitions, hardcore driving mechanics, and a track editor.

name: UFL
summary: UFL is a global online football league where only your skills matter. Join the revolution changing the world of football simulation forever today.

name: Unawake
summary: The eternal war between the forces of Heaven and Hell will be decided by you! Experience frantic, yet tactical first-person melee combat in breathtaking environments that push the boundaries of imagination.

name: Unholy
summary: Become Saidah, a mother in search of her abducted child. In the stealth-action horror game Unholy, venture through morbid streets of the last city on a dying planet.

name: Until Dawn [Remaster]
summary: A remaster of Until Dawn for PS5 and PC from developer Ballistic Moon.

name: V Rising
summary: Awaken as a weakened vampire from centuries of slumber and survive a world full of peril in the open-world vampire survival game V Rising.

name: Vampire Dynasty
summary: Embrace the darkness. Become one with the night. Feast on blood and start a dynasty. Rule as a merciful lord or a ruthless tyrant. Build a beautiful castle, fight and thrive in an open world - either alone or in co-op mode.

name: Vengeance is Mine
summary: Vengeance is Mine is a mech combat game for next-generation platforms. The game's brutal melee mech combat is augmented with a time-manipulation mechanic that adds a fascinating twist to encounters.

name: Vivaland
summary: VIVALAND is the first life simulation game built with multiplayer in mind from the ground up. Every household in Vivaland is controlled by real players around the world!

name: Vokabulantis
developers: Kong Orange Wired Fly Stop Motion
summary: Vokabulantis is a co-op puzzle platformer adventure game, featuring stop-motion animation work by Wired Fly Animation and story and dialog by acclaimed poet/artist Morten Søndergaard.

name: War Breeds
summary: You're in control of one of four distinct alien clans that are battling for superiority on their remote world. In order to win, you must manage and harvest special energy pods, which collect energy used to create a plethora of biomechanical devices and creatures.

name: Warpaws
summary: Let slip the dogs of war or embrace your inner feline and settle the age-old question of Cats vs Dogs, in Warpaws, a real-time strategy game where dogs and cats duke it out over territory to eventually destroy their opponent’s base. Wage all-out war, shown in cartoon-inspired art with slapstick humor.

name: When the Light Dies
summary: When the Light Dies is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a desolate, frozen wilderness. Step into a murky world of shadow and obscurity as a lone survivor fighting to keep the darkness and the horrors that lurk within at bay.

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition
summary: Return to Yeondu High School and uncover the dark truth that remained hidden in this direct sequel to the Korean horror classic. Investigate bizarre phenomena, evade bloodthirsty killers, and unravel a twisting narrative spread across three unnerving episodes.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within
summary: The first part of the Worldsoul Saga and the tenth overall expansion for World of Warcraft.

name: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
summary: Set in the chaotic final years of the Ming Dynasty, Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is an exploration of the hauntingly beautiful landscapes of imperial China and the battle against mysterious forces that transform a grim reality to supernatural horror.

name: Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom
summary: Yellow Taxi Goes Vroom is an arcade bump'a'jump platformer where you take people for rides and the oil industry for all they have.

name: Zero Caliber 2
summary: Get ready to experience the thrill of your life in Zero Caliber 2, the sequel to the critically acclaimed Zero Caliber VR! Cinematic action, explosions, tons of weapons to unlock, a full-blown single player/Co-op campaign, PvP, airstrikes and a VR experience you'll never forget!

name: Candy Shake Cup
summary: Candy elimination casual game with hundreds of levels and more fun in multiplayer games.

name: Dirge
summary: Band together with up to 4 friends to confront paranormal monsters. One player can take on the monster role to hunt the investigators. To win the game, you must survive long enough to accomplish all of the tasks to defeat the monsters. Step out of the shadows, no more running and hiding. Fight back!

name: Harpoon Shooter! Nozomi
summary: Shoot the harpoon and pull the enemies! Pull them in close and defeat for a higher score. For beginners, collect sweets instead of being attacked. You can enjoy retro and kawaii pixelarts, and deep game mechanics.

name: Jigsaw Fantastic Pets
summary: Jigsaw Fantastic Pets features beautiful art for pet lovers, including Dog Knights, Cat Mages, and more!

name: Last Train Home: Legion Tales
summary: Experience new, exhilarating stories from the Czechoslovak Legion on their odyssey home. Join Zoltan, a seasoned veteran and master storyteller, as he fondly recalls tales of courage and brotherhood from those who fought on the frontline.

name: Mystery Box: Hidden Secrets
summary: A point-and-click puzzle game where you have to solve intriguing riddles around different boxes and discover some cool stories about popular inventions!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series HUNTER OF DEVIL
summary: The world was full of peace, right up until the very end. Then, the doors of hell swung open and chaos swallowed all living things, transforming them into Demons! Become the Hunter and push back the forces of madness!

name: Words in Progress
summary: Words in Progress presents you with the task of creating the longest words possible with seven letter tiles. Once you combine a letter with another tile, a space opens up and a new letter appears, thus setting the stage for a game where you have multiple words in progress at the same time.

name: Farm Day Simulator 2024
summary: Introducing Farm Day Simulator 2024 – transform your free time into a joyous paradise! Immerse yourself in the fulfilling role of a virtual farmer as you embark on a journey to cultivate and nurture your dream farm.

name: Jetpack Joyride 2
summary: The evolved adventure of Jetpack Joyride with new HD graphics, new animations, new mechanics and a new way of playing

name: Maze of Realities: Flower of Discord Collector's Edition
summary: Several mysterious worlds remained unexplored to humans until a detective took up a new investigation into the disappearance of a group of explorers in Greenland.

name: Persona 3: Reload
summary: Persona 3 Reload is a ground-up remake of the beloved Atlus RPG. With new voice acting, music, and updated graphics, Persona 3 is shaping up to be better than ever.

name: Stitch.
summary: Stitch. is a casual puzzle game with embroidery on a numbered grid. The main objective is to fill in the levels' areas with no gaps to complete Hoops. Stitch. lets you create beautiful embroidery patterns, by solving levels and Hoops of various difficulties and sizes.

name: Drawing Carnival: Anime Edition
summary: Unleash your inner artist and create gorgeous paintings made in different art styles!

name: Snow Moto - Racing Adventure
summary: Embark on an icy adventure, steering a high-speed snow motorcycle through snow-covered landscapes. Dash through challenging checkpoints, from time-sensitive hurdles to gravity-defying trampolines. Winding forest trails and intricate roads test your reflexes and strategy.

name: Atomic Heart - Trapped in Limbo
summary: Continue the story by diving back into the mad world of Limbo!

name: Alisa
publishers: Casper Croes Top Hat Studios, Inc.
summary: Alisa is a classic late-90s style horror-themed action adventure game set in a fantasy universe inspired on the 1920s. You play as an Elite Royal Agent called Alisa.

name: Foamstars
summary: Foamstars focuses on delivering a fresh new take on the shooter genre, all based around the concept of “engaging in energetic foam battles that anyone can pick up and play.” Features 4V4 online play.

name: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
summary: A short handcrafted pixel art platformer that follows Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

name: Town Adventures
summary: Immerse yourself in the joy of exploration, tranquility, and discovery. Unwind and relax as you navigate the towns.

name: Dungeonoid 2 Awakening
summary: Classic dungeon crawling gets a block-busting twist in Dungeonoid 2 Awakening, a top-down adventure presented in retro pixel art style.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost
summary: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost is a rhythm game in which players can play popular arrangements of Touhou Project songs. Phantasia Lost is a rebuild of Touhou Danmaku Kagura as a stand-alone game, with a completely new storyline.

name: Choice of Life: Middle Ages 2
publishers: Blazing Planet Studio Redblack Spade Samustai
summary: In the card game Choice of Life: Middle Ages 2, you have to weigh every decision not to die ahead of time! Explore the kingdom from the snowy forests of the north to the endless fields of the south and meet its inhabitants.

name: Drone Delivery Simulator
summary: Take to the skies in "Drone Delivery Simulator," a single-player game where you start as a humble pizza delivery pilot and rise to master a variety of complex delivery missions.

name: Galactic Wars: Defend Your Star Worlds
summary: Embark on a cosmic odyssey with Galactic Wars: Defend Your Star Worlds, a game where players take on the heroic quest of liberating planets from enemy clutches, defending against intergalactic threats, and strategically capturing celestial bodies.

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy
summary: Navigate breathtaking, celestial worlds while mastering the beat of chart-topping hits from today’s most popular artists, including PinkPantheress, Charlie Puth, Duran Duran, and more. Discover fresh new music from tomorrow’s biggest stars on a cosmic trip where every note guides your way.

name: Legendary Tales
summary: Legendary tales is a VR Action roleplaying game with up to 4 player co-op. Collect items, enhance your abilities and fight your way through an ever changing dungeon to make your own Legendary Tales.

name: Pirates: Caribbean Chronicles
summary: Embark on a pirate's adventure where your choices steer the fate of the Caribbean's most feared crew.

name: Republic of Jungle
summary: Gather your friends (5 to 10 players) and play as advisors to President Puma. His re-election depends on your loyalty. In a social deduction party game, Leakers try to sneak into missions to leak Puma's secrets- Loyalists try to suss them out. Read the room and bluff your way to a political victory.

name: The House of Da Vinci
