summary: Enter The House of Da Vinci, where you will solve mechanical puzzles, discover hidden objects, escape from rooms, and dive into the authentic atmosphere of the Renaissance in the 3D puzzle adventure game The House of Da Vinci.

name: Truck Simulator USA Revolution
summary: Want to know what driving an 18 Wheeler feels like?

name: Borzoi Adventure
summary: Borzoi Adventure invites players into a whimsical world where they embody the spirited Borzoi. Embark on this journey alongside the graceful canine explorer and uncover the riches hidden within each landscape.

name: Football Simulator 2024
summary: Are you ready to write your name in football history? Lace up your boots and step into the world of Football Simulator 2024.

name: Jubilee
summary: Challenging precision platformer based on tight, fluid movement. Open map layout with multiple routes. Collect gems and save animals.

name: The Nom
summary: You were turned into a dark creature by evil scientists and finally managed to break free! It's time for revenge!

name: MakOS new operating system
summary: Experience the full range of incredible features on the MakOS new operating system.

name: 100 Ninja Cats
summary: Join the adventure in the ninja-themed locations full of cats! Explore the hand-drawn artwork as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Monster Legacy: New Horizons
summary: Discover the adventures of these peculiar adventurous children who explore fantastic worlds and encounter monsters of all types.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden
summary: Set in the haunted wilds of North America in 1695, Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden is an action-RPG called starring a pair of ghost hunters who vowed to protect the living from the threat of lingering ghosts and specters.

name: Islands of Insight
summary: In a realm of ancient wonder and natural beauty, the quest for wisdom connects all who dwell within. Discover a breathtaking open-world multiplayer game where puzzles form the very fabric of reality, players grow stronger with every insight, and a curious mind is the only weapon you’ll need.

name: News Tower
summary: News Tower is a news and resource management game. Your goal is to build a newspaper empire in 1930s New York that is profitable, independent, and – most importantly -- wins the trust of its readers.

name: Ultra Foodmess
summary: Ultra Foodmess combines food, fun, games, and chaos into one party game! Engage in a competition that will cost you your friendships, because you will be hungry for victory!

name: Cut the Rope 3
summary: Om Nom's third numbered Cut the Rope adventure promises an exciting twist with new mechanics and a thrilling puzzlequest to explore uncharted lands.

name: Lords of Exile
summary: Embark on a quest for revenge in Lords of Exile, an 8-bit side-scrolling action platformer set in the far Lands of Exilia. With classic retro mechanics and linear level design in 8-bit graphics.

name: My Name is Mayo 3
summary: Behold the third and final entry of the “My Name is Mayo” Universe! This climactic clicker game about a mayo jar is an overwhelming and emotional story with the classic real-life tapping mechanic, lots of unlockable achievements in between, and one other surprise buried inside.

name: A Little to the Left
summary: A Little to the Left is a puzzle game that lets players sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements in 75+ levels while keeping an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Clash II
summary: Clash II is a turn-based strategy game in a world steeped in ancient magic. Immerse yourself in its history and explore forgotten land full of magical creatures. Gather and train an army, expand your stronghold, upgrade your heroes! Lead one side of the conflict and decide the fate of the continent!

name: Hawked
summary: HAWKED is an online PvPvE extraction shooter. Squad up to explore a mysterious island, battle monsters, outwit enemy players to steal ancient treasures, and get the hell outta there!

name: Lake
summary: In the scenic adventure game Lake, Meredith meets lots of new people, gets into romances, helps prevent the construction of apartments, gets reconnected with her BFFs, rats or bails out a colleague, and gets pushed by her boss back home to recommit to her career job.

name: Lo-Fi Haiku: Coffee and Chill
summary: Take a sip of coffee and wake up your inner poet. Let the words flow with the soft waves of Lo-Fi music. Chill, ease your mind and create.

name: Master of Weapon
summary: Master of Weapon is a top-down vertically-oriented shooter, where your ship can collect various weapons to take out air and ground attackers.

name: PlateUp!
summary: PlateUp! delivers a new twist on the chaotic cooking genre, with permanent roguelite kitchen-based upgrades on top of familiar frenetic gameplay. Cook, serve and run your own restaurant, using money earned to expand and refine your culinary empire with new unlocks, abilities and dishes.

name: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
summary: Smalland is a big adventure on a tiny scale! Enjoy multiplayer survival in a vast, hazardous world. Traverse lake sized puddles, scale skyscraper sized trees, and battle or tame creatures.

name: Swords and Adventures
summary: Choose between Barbarian, Elf or Mage and enter a dangerous fantasy world where hundreds of enemies await you, eager to taste your blood. Gain experience, defeat your enemies and trade powerful artifacts.

name: Twilight Survivors
summary: A time-limited survival game infused with rogue-lite elements and an adorable art style! The world has plunged into darkness, and you are its sole beacon of hope.

name: Art of Glide
summary: Embark on a serene and enchanting adventure with “Art of Glide”, a relaxing game that invites you to soar through an infinitely generated idyllic forest environments as a paper plane.

name: Duck, Quack, Shoot!
summary: Duck, Quack, Shoot! Is a fun party game styled like an old-fashioned mechanical carnival shooting gallery. Can you beat the ducks?

name: I Love Finding Furbabies - Collector's Edition
summary: Collect cute furry creatures in this engaging hidden object game. The Collector's Edition includes 6 extra locations, 12 minigames, Wallpapers, and a music player.

name: SCREAM AND STEEL - Horror Story Shooter
summary: Prepare for a pulse-pounding odyssey into fear with "Scream and Steel - Horror Story Shooter." Your journey begins as you wake up in the inky blackness of a foreboding basement, surrounded by locked doors shrouded in mystery.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
summary: Trails of Cold Steel III invites players into a world full of intrigue and excitement! Embark on a whirlwind tour through the never-before-seen lands of the recently expanded Erebonian countryside, and encounter fresh faces as well as old friends familiar to fans of the series.

name: Z War Apocalypse Shooter
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding 3D shooting adventure in "Z War Apocalypse Shooter" where the fate of the world rests on your shoulders. A relentless wave of zombies has engulfed the city, and as the last line of defense, it's up to you to stand against the undead horde.

name: Focus Tower
summary: Are thou brave enough to climb the Focus Tower? With puzzles, precision platforming and a hookshot, can you reach the ancient power?

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024 - Driving Sim
summary: Where precision meets velocity, customize your ride, conquer the roads, and become the ultimate driving maestro!

name: Adam Wolfe
summary: Step into the shoes of Adam Wolfe, investigator of the supernatural. Solving one mystery after another, slowly unravel a larger conspiracy that could lead you to your missing sibling, but may also drag you into the abyss forever.

name: Nightingale
summary: Nightingale is a shared-world survival crafting game, set in an all-new fantasy universe. You are stranded beyond our world, cut off by the sudden collapse of the arcane portal network.

name: Return to Grace
summary: A daring space archaeologist has just unearthed the ancient resting place of a long lost A.I. god known as Grace. Adventure with various fractured A.I. personalities as you uncover the great mystery of why she was shut down all those years ago.

name: Warframe
summary: Join the fight in this co-op focused shooter from Digital Extremes. Join your friends in player-vs-enemy raids across the solar system and master the power of the Warframes.

name: Battletoads in Battlemaniacs
summary: Michiko and Zitz have been seized by the Pigs of the Apocalypse and are being held captive by Silas Volkmire and the Dark Queen and it's up to you to save them. Either alone or with a friend, you'll face a horde of pigs, skeletons, and other nasties as you battle to reach your buddies. BATTLETOADS IN BATTLEMANIACS will give your fighting skills quite a workout.

name: Geometry Survivor
summary: Geometry Survivor is a rogue-lite survival game where you fight waves of enemies. Unlock innovative upgrades in the shop, acquire new ships and conquer the unforgiving grid world.

name: Kneedle Knight
summary: Kneedle Knight is a 3rd-person puzzle platformer game. Conjure fabric with a magic needle as Sir Lukoss the Small and merge in and out of fabric. Solve puzzles, platform across magical objects, and defeat cursed candle minions to return Sir Lukoss to normal and defeat the Witch of Fabric!

name: Myth of Empires
summary: Myth of Empires is a multiplayer sandbox game which features a high degree of freedom. Build fortresses, lead armies in massive battles, siege enemy cities, and establish your own empire!

name: R.C. Pro-Am
summary: Grab your controller and pull up to the starting line. It's your against four other all-star racers. You'll face hair-pin turns, outragerous curves, oil slicks and rainclouds as you make your way through 32 trecherous courses.

name: Snake Rattle 'n' Roll
summary: Travel through 11 levels of adventure full of hurtling anvils, exploding Nibbley Pibbleys, flying carpets, ferocious 3-D terrain, and more. Play alone or with a friend.

name: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance
summary: In Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance, a real-time strategy game set in the Terminator universe, command forces in the war between humanity and Legion's synthetic intelligent machine network.

name: Aery - Stone Age
summary: In Aery - Stone Age you play as a little flying spirit that watches humanity in its early states evolve. You will discover a long-forgotten land with beautiful environments, and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Escape Simulator: Magic DLC
summary: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set in the world of witches and wizards. Grab your equipment in the magic shop and then go onward to the school of magic, where three classes await your mastery.

name: Inkulinati
summary: Inkulinati is a turn-based strategy with medieval animals inspired by 700 years-old real-life medieval marginalia. In Inkulinati, you are a Master of Living Ink, also known as the titular Inkulinati. You are part of a legendary group who battle one another on the pages of medieval manuscripts.

name: Make it! Taiyaki
summary: It's time for a taiyaki-making challenge! Can you master this traditional Japanese sweet? Make as many as you can!

name: Pacific Drive
summary: Pacific Drive is a run-based, first-person driving survival game. Your car is your only companion as you navigate a surreal and anomaly-filled reimagining of the Pacific Northwest.

name: Slimeboo
summary: Boo, a small and adorable slime, has gotten lost on a tropical island. To find his way home, he must leap over all the obstacles in his path. Help him overcome them!

name: Squirrel Stapler
summary: Hunt squirrels, staple them to a corpse, and meet god.

name: Toy Rider
summary: Toy Rider is a fast paced action car racing game with lots of powerups, tracks, vehicles, adventures, and more. It's not just about speed it's about balancing, timing, proper use of powerups & high speed. Get ready to race against the most ruthless AI in the world, Start your engines now!

name: Dino Race - Dinosaur Ride Ranch
summary: Embark on a thrilling prehistoric racing adventure in Dino Race - Dinosaur Ride Ranch! Saddle up on majestic dinosaurs to compete against fierce rivals on diverse and challenging routes.

name: Promenade
summary: Promenade is a 2D collect-a-thon/exploration/adventure game that takes place in an oniric and enchanting world. Have you ever wanted to explore a world full of mysteries and unique environments? Put on your hoodie, grab your poulp friend with you and get ready to catch everything you can!

name: King's Odyssey: Dwarves' Tale
summary: Unearth the secrets of the deep and forge your legacy in King's Odyssey: Dwarves' Tale, where every hammer strike tells a story of bravery and brotherhood.

name: Lion Simulator Survival: RPG Animal Battle
summary: Roar through the savannah, hunt prey, and lead your pride in Lion Simulator Survival - an immersive RPG animal battle experience.

name: 100 Robo Cats
summary: Explore hand-drawn artwork of Robot-themed locations and robo-cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Test your attention and observation skills in this hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Hike Adventures
summary: Embark on a leisurely journey through enchanting places of peace and discovery. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature. Look for hidden treasures and unique places that will take your breath away.

name: Code Zodiac
summary: Fight for the future in this story-heavy, boss-fights-only action game. Defeat, debug, and repair massive robots as you uncover the dark secrets of the Zodiac System.

name: Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons
franchises: Story of Seasons / Bokujou Monogatari Piczle Cross
summary: Enjoy the bucolic charm of Story of Seasons while relaxing and exercising your brain with classic Piczle Cross nonogram logic-puzzles.

name: Spear Master
summary: You are the son of a mighty hero. Now it's your turn to protect the world from an ancient evil.

name: Archery Pro
summary: Archery Pro is an archery simulation video game played with VR (Virtual Reality).

name: Dead End City
summary: A post-apocalyptic arcade shooter. Collect fuel and dodge enemy fire as you fight back against the evil Scorpio gang. Mixes cars, shmups and themes that would have been right at home in 80's anime and arcades..

name: GOBLIN SLAYER -ANOTHER ADVENTURER- NIGHTMARE FEAST
summary: “Goblin Slayer” first Console Game released. The original creator of the series, Kumo Kagyu, is in charge of the original concept and series composition, while the main character designs are being handled by Noboru Kannatsuki, who also worked on the original series.

name: Astral Party
summary: Astral Party is a multiplayer party game populated by anime girls. Choose your favorite character, strategize skills & cards, and roll the dice to destroy friendships in this unique board game.

name: Cavern of Dreams
summary: Cavern of Dreams is an N64-style 3D adventure game homage to Banjo-Kazooie (which was known as Project Dream prior to its reveal). Young dragon explores mysterious hub Cavern of Dreams and the strange worlds inside it to find his siblings. Gain new abilities, meet unique characters, solve puzzles and find secrets!

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ
summary: Dragon Ball FighterZ is born from what makes the Dragon Ball series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters!

name: Heavenly Bodies
summary: Discover the ever-changing nuances of weightless motion in the physics-focused game Heavenly Bodies. Wrangle the hands and arms of cosmonauts and push, pull and twist your way through a precarious range of stellar scenarios.

name: KASHIDO
summary: KASHIDO is a board game based on the theme of "Wagashi," a traditional Japanese confectionary. Players compete for points by arranging the four different colors of wagashi tiles vertically, horizontally, vertically, diagonally, and left to right.

name: PopSlinger
summary: PopSlinger is a vibrant, narrative-focused musical shooter. Join Ria Carbon, a funky heroine on a stylish quest to save the world from sinister invaders from another dimension using soda-powered guns.

name: Tamarak Trail
summary: In this deck-building roguelike, you'll use a customizable dice set as you battle through randomly generated trails - full of loot, mysteries, and danger to protect inhabitants from the evil that has corrupted the trail.

name: War of Aero
summary: War of Aero (originally subtitled Project MEIOU) is a shooter released by Allumer in 1993. The player's aircraft can be fitted with pods on either side, which can be turned around to shoot up and down. In addition, when the 1P and 2P aircraft are stacked on top of each other, they merge to create a powerful attack.

name: Fire Race
summary: Employ your drifting skills and power-ups to gain an edge, while dodging obstacles strewn across your path on the way to the podium.

name: Rainbow Reactor: Fusion
summary: Get ready for a puzzling adventure at the Rainbow Reactor – where story-driven exploration is fused together with frantic color-matching gameplay!

name: Taser Gun
summary: It's time to taser the bad guys! Take aim and stop the bad guys from reaching you!

name: ServiceIT: You can do IT
summary: You're the owner of a full-service IT solutions company. Diagnose and repair the equipment, solve the problems of your customers and provide technical support. Configure the network, hire and manage your crew. Remember to control your finances. Become the best serviceIT company in the world!

name: Bang-On Balls: Chronicles
summary: Bang-On Balls: Chronicles is an oddball of a 3D platforming game with collect-a-thon spin! Become a reckless hero as you do missions, collect items and search for secrets rolling through various (inaccurate) historical events!

name: Expeditions: A Mudrunner Game
summary: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner.

name: Mediterranea Inferno
summary: Explore the inner demons of three childhood friends on a summer retreat. Unearth secrets, fears, and obsessions as you help them reconnect and rediscover themselves.

name: 100 March Cats
summary: Explore the hand-drawn artwork of March-themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Test your attention and observation skills in this cozy and delightful hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cat and Ghostly Road
summary: Cat and Ghostly Road is an atmospheric point-and-click quest in which you play as a white cat. You have to go on a dangerous journey to the world of ghosts and demons. Not all things are what they seem.

name: Reveil
summary: REVEIL is a narrative first-person psycho-thriller game that focuses on story, puzzles and exploration. Find out what’s going on inside Walter Thompson and what his dark past at the Nelson Bros Circus has to do with it.

name: Valiant Hearts: The Collection
summary: Valiant Hearts: The Collection is a combo pack of two 2D narrative-driven adventure games Valiant Hearts: The Great War and Valiant Hearts: Coming Home developed by Ubisoft Montpellier. Players will experience a full emotional journey of love, sacrifice, and friendship during the events of World War 1. At the heart of the two tales, the characters will help each other to retain their humanity against the horrors of war.

name: Abriss
summary: Abriss is a physics-destruction puzzle game in stylish surreal-futuristic city worlds. Build structures from parts to let them crash into your targets. Unlock new parts, destroy more, witness entropy at its worst in digital-brutalist cityscapes. Build to destroy!

name: As Dusk Falls
summary: As Dusk Falls is an original interactive drama that explores the entangled lives of two families across thirty years in small town Arizona

name: Bottle Tap
summary: Use your intellect to discover various ways to collect stars using a bottle cap on intricate and unique levels. Gather all the stars, employing your intellect and bottle caps, to advance through the level. If you relish challenges, this game will assist you in that and demonstrate how adept you are at puzzle-solving.

name: Dreamland Solitaire: Dragon's Fury
summary: When a dragon's fire lights up the night sky and burns a lowly village to the ground, only one fairy can set things right. You must take the role of this enchanting creature as she completes quests in her search of why this tragedy occurred.

name: Lost Lands: Stories of the First Brotherhood
summary: A strong brotherhood is forged only in difficult trials. “Lost Lands: Stories of the First Brotherhood” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Metal Mind
summary: MetalMind fuse transforming Mecha with Roguelites, and combine game mechanics such as weight, armor pieces, and unique weapon heat for you to challenge free will as an anthropomorphized AI.

name: Potions: A Curious Tale
summary: Potions: A Curious Tale is an adventure and crafting game where wit is your greatest weapon and combat is not always the answer.

name: Taxi Life: A City Driving Simulator
summary: In the driving sim Taxi Life, venture around Barcelona's buzzing streets as you deliver passengers, cargo, and more. Complete time-based jobs, evade traffic jams, and road hazards, all while respecting the rules of the road. Discover famous city landmarks while building your transportation empire!

name: Time to Morp
summary: Time to Morp is a colony sim game in which you take care of playful creatures - Morps. Use their skills to gather resources, build pipe networks, automate everything and explore the world to find new species and rare materials.

name: Warrior Escape
summary: Help our Space Warrior escape this ship by touching your screen to fly higher. Stay away from the door, and don't drop down.

name: Akka Arrh
summary: Akka Arrh is a reimagining of the intriguing prototype shooter game originally made by Atari in 1982. The game features a psychedelic explosion of color and visual effects on top of its challenging multi-viewpoint gameplay.

name: Bubble Fresh Fruits
summary: Dive into a juicy world bursting with vibrant colors and delicious fruits waiting to be popped and matched.

name: Cube Jump Ultimate
summary: This is a simple cross the street game using an isometric format. If you fall, the game is over.

name: Dentist Bling
summary: Treat your patients with different dental issues, from cavities to plaque buildup, and watch as their smiles transform under your expert care!

name: Neon On!
summary: Get your neon cables out of knots and connect them to the right light sources to create amazing neon masterpieces!

name: Stilt
summary: Stilt is a colorful, stunning VR platformer game that takes inspiration from classic platformers.

name: The Crystals of Atlantis
summary: The Crystals of Atlantis is a story-based puzzle game, where players take on the role of an intrepid archaeologist working against the clock in a desperate bid to solve the mystery of Atlantis and save humanity from oblivion.

name: Wallpaper Wizard: Infinite Backdrops
summary: Immerse yourself in a universe of creativity and color with our exclusive collection of wallpapers, designed to transform your space into a visually stimulating experience.

name: Gunsmith Workshop Simulator
summary: Embark on the journey of a seasoned gunsmith in Gunsmith Workshop Simulator. Immerse yourself in the detailed world of firearms customization, where you assemble, modify, and test a diverse range of weapons.

name: Star Racer
summary: Soar through concrete and cosmos in Star Racer, a retro-infused combat racer. Drift through hazardous pavement, defy gravity and glide through the stars, and crush the competition by any means necessary!

name: Block Magic Puzzle
summary: Fill the empty 8x8 tiles with blocks until they are full horizontally or vertically and disappear. There are 5 different modes you can play: Classic mode, Timed mode, Blast mode, Advanced mode, and Challenge Mode.

name: English Tracing Book
summary: English Tracing Book is an alphabet learning programme that makes learning fun for kids. English Tracing Book is more than just an educational programme for children. The interface allows kids to focus on reading and writing the alphabet.

name: Nuke Them All
summary: An RTS classic reborn with a twist. Time is of the essence, Commander! Capture the flags, conquer the territories, and eliminate the enemy fort. And finally, nuke them all! This old-school sci-fi Indie real time strategy game, crafted by devoted team, revives the genre's enduring allure.

name: Contra: Operation Galuga
summary: Contra: Operation Galuga is a thorough reimagining of the classic run-'n'-gun action game from the '80s, featuring modern graphics and sound, new stages, new enemies and bosses, new play mechanics, an updated weapons system, and explosive co-op combat.

name: Hotel Renovator
summary: Unleash your creativity and build the hotel of your dreams! Embark on a makeover journey to turn a worn-out hotel into a successful getaway. Manage amenities, design neat rooms, and create a place that eclipses the golden age. Get that 5-star review!

name: Mario Tennis [GBC]
summary: Spin, Lob, Drop, Smash -- It's time for some Mario Tennis! Begin your tennis career as a rookie at the Royal Tennis Academy. Then try your luck on some Mario Mini-games.

name: Passing By: A Tailwind Journey
summary: In Passing By: A Tailwind Journey, an innovative genre hybrid of 2D puzzle platformer, survival game and adventure, you can explore the world at your own leisure, travelling from island to island by balloon ship and solving various puzzles while having to manage your resources in order to survive.

name: Subterrain: Mines of Titan
summary: An uncompromising turn-based survival RPG set on Titan. After discovering your stasis pod, a doomed mining camp needs your help to survive the evolving horrors that lurk below. Research and craft equipment, fight against odds, and discover your destiny.

name: Gridrunner Remastered (Gold Master Series)
summary: Released exclusively as part of the Gold Master Series title Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story, Gridrunner Remastered re-imagines the shooter on a tilted 3D plane. The game is built on the original C64 code.

name: MACROSS -Shooting Insight-
summary: MACROSS -Shooting Insight- is a shoot 'em up that features six different stories and allows you to play as characters from across Macross's history. Embark upon a galaxy-spanning mission to rescue the missing songstresses.

name: Balloony
summary: Help Balloony get his treasure back from the evil Dr. Blimp! Whether alone or together with your friends, you'll have to face the dangers of many different worlds on Balloony's biggest platform adventure yet! Roll, jump and fly together, but be careful not to burst!

name: Darkness and Flame
summary: Darkness and Flame - enjoy this adventure game with lots of quests and hidden objects, puzzles and mini-games!

name: Fantastical Mystery Adventure Ultimate Jumbo Jet Murder Case
summary: A visual novel game starring the members of the streamer group 'Ultimate Jumbo Jet' (aka ARUJAN), who mainly stream activities such as the Space Werewolf game.

name: Ib
summary: A remake of a 2012 2D Japanese indie game, players take on the role of a young girl named Ib is trapped in a spooky art gallery and must solve puzzles and disarm traps to escape.

name: Lazriel: The Demon's Fall
summary: Lazriel, an angel of heaven, has been plunged into the demon world far below. Now her only hope of returning is for her to climb the tower. But will she succumb to the demons' powers before she makes it back alive?

name: Nice Disc: The Last Hot Blood
summary: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

name: Re:Cento
summary: Like "Old Maid," you draw a card from the player to your left but where it gets exciting is you can force opponents to pick up cards while avoiding having cards forced into your hand. The player who empties his/her hand first wins.

name: Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection
summary: Relive intense battles from the Star Wars galaxy in the Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection. Jump into firefights across massive battlefields on the ground, in the air, and in space as the Empire, Rebellion, Republic, and the Separatist Alliance. Choose an array of unique classes, pilot a multitude of vehicles, and play as iconic heroes and villains from multiple eras of the saga in solo, local, and online play.

name: ToyBox Easter
summary: The Easter toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Easter has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Cozy Hamlets
summary: Cozy Hamlets is a cozy medieval town-builder without the stress of resource management or point scoring, just endless creativity allowing the creation of idyllic medieval towns through the games intuitive and user-friendly controls, offering the perfect escape into a world where tranquility reigns supreme.

name: Kingdom Come Deliverance - Royal Edition
summary: Rooted within the Holy Roman Empire during the late Middle Ages, Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Royal Edition is a first-person RPG where you engage in a power struggle for the throne. Royal Edition features Kingdom Come Deliverance and all of its DLC.

name: Orion Haste
summary: Shoot enemies with powerful weapons, defeat colossal bosses, and even race to beat your best time in this nostalgic platform shooter. As a human soldier stationed on a military fort in outer space, you must answer the distress signal emanating from a nearby planet.

name: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Mighty Alliance
summary: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Mighty Alliance follows an original storyline in which the PJ Masks travel into space to save the day. When an experiment goes wrong at their headquarters, Catboy, PJ Power Q, Owelette, and Gekko must band together to collect the special technology that has been scattered.

name: Sherlock Purr 2
summary: Our clever cat detective is back, and this time the mystery unfolds all over the apartment. Immerse yourself in an extended adventure full of intriguing challenges, vibrant colors and brain-teasing puzzles.

name: DOG RACING - LOVELY PET FRIENDS PAW
summary: Race with your furry friend in this thrilling game! Customize your adorable pup, navigate challenging tracks, and conquer obstacles together. Manage resources to keep your loyal companion healthy and stylish as you embark on an exciting journey of dog racing camaraderie!

name: Waking Tides
summary: Welcome to Waking Tides, a small but captivating atmospheric adventure game that thrives on experimentation. Delve into a world where augmented reality extends your gameplay, seamlessly blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

name: Hades
summary: Defy the god of death as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld in this roguelite dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion and Transistor.

name: Alone in the Dark
summary: Psychological Horror meets Southern Gothic in this reimagination of the ground-breaking survival horror game, Alone in the Dark. Play as either Edward Carnby or Emily Hartwood and explore your environments, fight monsters, solve puzzles and uncover the uneasy truth of Derceto Manor...

name: Scott Whiskers in: the Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw
summary: A modern, funny and family-friendly point & click adventure about cats, Star Trek and life itself. Created in the spirit of the classics of the genre.

name: Across the Obelisk
summary: Across the Obelisk is a coop RPG deckbuilding roguelite. You can play solo or with up to three other players. Choose your heroes, unlock items and cards, craft your deck and face powerful enemies in deep tactical combat. Would you dare to go across the obelisk?

name: April's Diary
publishers: CRX Entertainment Pte Ltd. Soft Source Pte. Ltd.
summary: Help April, a young housekeeper in England during the Victorian era to clean up the many rooms in Lord Ashford's manor. Challenging and fun 3D puzzles with a match-3 element embedded.

name: BattleJuice Alchemist
summary: BattleJuice Alchemist is a complex alchemy RPG that adds an equipment-based skill system to the classic aRPG formula. Focus on top-down combat or opt for JRPG-style one-on-one fights. Explore the wilderness, learn ritual magic, and craft potions to fight demonic hordes overrunning the lands.

name: Finding America: The West Collector's Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of the Western United States and discover its hidden treasures in this hidden object game.

name: Just Find It 2 Collector's Edition
summary: Find all the differences, make matches, play memory games, and complete challenging puzzles for unexpected surprises that will keep you engaged throughout your adventure!

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator VR
summary: Escape to a world where it’s always sunny and there is always grass that needs mowing – Lawn Mowing Simulator VR allows you to find your inner zen through the art of mowing and string trimming.

name: NightGhast
summary: Nightghast is a first-person horror game about wicked witches and sinister widows... Explore a supposedly-haunted house and determine whether or not it is in fact haunted.

name: Pull The Pin: Ball Physic Puzzle
summary: Classic physics based puzzle - color the balls and fill the glass with colored balls while avoiding obstacles!

name: Shines Over: The Damned
summary: Shines Over: The Damned is a horror adventure game where your senses will be tested and your reality questioned. Immerse yourself in a mysterious and terrifying world where scares, tension and environmental puzzles surround you, and danger lies in wait.

name: Surprise Attack
summary: Recover the space station, shuttle, and moon base from the forces of BLACK DAWN, an international terrorist group that threatens the universe. Recover all bombs and reach the final location to clear stages, then face off against a boss. You can even get bonus points by taking a quiz.

name: Western Frontier
summary: Western Frontier us a 2d action shooter in which Billy, an assassin, fights in the frontier days of the west!

name: Breachway
summary: Explore the galaxy in this deckbuilding, sci-fi roguelike where ship upgrades and crew management are key to your survival. Optimize resource generation, engage in intense turn-based battles, and take on ever-growing threats as you seek out The Signal.

name: Drift Legacy
summary: Experience the ultimate drifting thrill with Drift Legacy! Choose and customize your dream car, from its performance to its appearance, making it truly yours. Tackle a variety of routes, from the industrial atmosphere of bustling docks to high-speed racetracks.

name: Multi Maze 3D
summary: Spin the wheel to the right or left and guide the balls through the maze straight into the cup!

name: Real Estate Simulator: From Bum to Millionaire
summary: Ready to transform from Broke to Rich while forging your real estate empire? Start small, strategize for tycoon status. Engage with diverse NPC clients, oversee properties from affordable to luxurious, and conquer challenges. Ready to dominate the real estate world?

name: Swing By
summary: Start your space expedition with Swing by - a game that will test your skills and reflexes! Become a master of spaceship control as you race through endless space. Your task is simple but challenging: collect valuable gems and win prizes while skillfully maneuvering through space.

name: Virtual Girlfriend Dating Simulator
summary: Navigate the complexities of young love in a vibrant college setting. Every choice shapes your destiny in this dating simulation game!

name: PORTAL SHOT GUN TELEPORT
summary: Defy gravity and warp to victory! Master your portal gun, strategically placing portals across diverse maps.

name: Blood Strike
summary: Blood Strike is a fast-paced FPS Battle Royale mobile game optimized for low-end devices and limited storage. Experience 100-player Battle Royale with fully customizable weapons.

name: Bounties of Babylon
summary: Expand the map with tiles, harvest its bounties, and trade them at settlements to gain victory points. Embark on quests and discover treasure, all whilst avoiding being raided by other ships.

name: Boomeroad
summary: Boomeroad is an action-adventure game in which players slide along boomerang rails you will create. The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky, and the player slides through the vast skies at their own will while searching for the Artifacts.

name: DC Universe Online
publishers: Sony Online Entertainment Daybreak Game Company
summary: A massively-multiplayer experience, DC Universe Online brings high-energy action to the forefront with a combat system designed to deliver a fast-paced action experience with the extraordinary powers of your personally created heroes and villains at your disposal.

name: Go Fight Fantastic
summary: Bird Planet is under attack! Team up in co-op (local and online) or fight the invaders solo in this fast-paced, light-hearted and vibrantly hand-drawn hack n’ slash for 1-3 players.

name: Nottolot
summary: Nottolot is a free-to-play robot hacking action game. The main character, Rolly, uses his "hacking ability" to control four enemies and escape from a robot production factory!

name: South Park: Snow Day
summary: Play as the New kid in South Park and join Cartman, Stan, Kyle, and Kenny, in three-dimensional glory, to celebrate the most magical day in any young child’s life - a snow day! Grab up to three friends, in this four-player co-op, and battle your way through the snow-piled town of South Park on a quest to save the world and enjoy a day without school. It’s a snow day, dude!

name: AFK Journey
summary: FK Journey is a 3D world-based RPG set in the familiar world of AFK Arena, combining open-world RPG mechanics with idle-based casual gameplay.

name: Distant Bloom
summary: Distant Bloom is a cozy management and exploration game which lets you discover an alien planet where things have gone amiss. Harness the power of plants to restore the environment and build a flourishing community with your crewmates.

name: Not Tonight 2
summary: A road trip through an alternative, broken America, Not Tonight 2 is a political dark comedy that takes aim at the absolute state that they call The United States.

name: The Magical Mixture Mill
summary: In the potion-crafting game The Magical Mixture Mill, team up with a mushroom-loving witch to restore her run-down shop. Build automated production lines, experiment with exotic ingredients, explore a cozy world -- and try not to blow everything up.

name: Vikings: Valhalla Saga
summary: Vikings: Valhalla Saga is a real-time role-playing game that offers a realistic and action-packed Viking world. Players are expected to position themselves as the leader of a Viking clan and build a strong village.

name: Alto's Odyssey: The Lost City
summary: Join Alto and his friends on an endless sandboarding journey to find The Lost City and unearth the secrets hidden within.

name: Escape Fear: Hide And Seek Horror
summary: You find yourself in an abandoned house, captured by a ruthless maniac. You have to secretly explore the house, find hidden objects and use them to escape from the maniac.

name: Forrader Hero
summary: Forrader Hero is a turn-based game with roguelike elements where heroes can't step back and must fight through the end to save their soul in "Forgotten Proto.World" fighting hordes of monsters, undead creatures, and their overlords.

name: Junior Labyrinth
summary: 12 secrets hidden in the maze of the magic castle are waiting to be discovered! But the paths are changing constantly: where there was a free passage a mere moment ago, there is now suddenly a wall! Who can best move the corridors to reach the most secrets?

name: Nyanzou and Kumakichi Bomb Cave
summary: Avoid bombs, break the wall and proceed through the cave. Push through the cave where bombs and the treasures sleep! You can sell the treasures you get and create a nice shop.

name: One Last Breath
summary: The Earth is sick and we are the disease. All hope rests on Gaia, a powerful being born from mother nature’s last breath. Use her abilities to alter the environment, escape from dangerous creatures, solve thoughtful puzzles and survive in this dying world, while you restore life across the world.

name: OTXO
summary: Enter an inexplicable, abstract mansion to rescue a loved one in this fast-paced, brutal, and dark roguelite filled with precise but savage gunplay and time-bending slow motion. Face your inner demons and unveil the secrets of the Mansion.

name: Pepper Grinder
summary: Pepper Grinder is an action-packed pirate adventure starring the titular Pepper, a seafaring soul with a passion for prospecting, and Grinder, her super-powered drilling device.

name: Skate Fish
summary: Use touch controls to flip your skateboard, grind ledges, and perform aerials as you impress fish with your skills in Skate Fish.

name: Stacklands
summary: Stacklands is a village builder where you stack cards to collect food, build structures, and fight creatures.

name: Tropico [VR]
summary: Tropico is rich in resources, ripe with potential, and crying out for a leader with extraordinary vision! Take hold of the levers of power with the Meta Quest's motion controllers, and lead your people by the hand to a brighter future using custom-built VR interfaces and intuitive gestures.

name: 3D Printer - PrintMaster Simulator
summary: Dive into the world of 3D printing technology, where you'll build, customize, and manage your very own 3D printing workshop!

name: Coffee, Plis
summary: Serving coffee in complete chaos, "Coffee, Plis" shows a crazy day of service in all the coffee shops in the city. Being able to play alone or with friends all you have to do is serve customers.

name: Go Kart Mania
summary: Go Kart Mania brings the thrill ride of go-kart racing right to your Nintendo Switch. Race through 36 uniquely challenging tracks in iconic locations from Europe, China, and Australia, each offering a distinct racing experience. Customize your kart to outsmart competitors.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Nature
summary: Jigsaw Puzzle: Nature offers 30 unique levels in a relaxing atmosphere. Go on a colorful adventure through the seasons and complete beautiful jigsaws!

name: Project Apidom
summary: Project Apidom looks to bring it's own unique approach to the MOBA genre by combining RPG level progression, item crafting, and custom builds with strategic 3v3v3 arena combat, forcing players into constant conflict with multiple factions at once in tactically oriented proxy battles for supremacy.

name: Labyrinthia Nightmares: The Journey of Little Fluffypuff
summary: Descend into a realm of nightmares and marvels in this adventure game. Guide the adorable Little Fluffypuff through a labyrinthine world teeming with mystery and danger. Maneuver through treacherous mazes, unravel puzzles, and engage in battles against formidable creatures in your quest for freedom.

name: Don't Be Afraid
publishers: Drageus Games Untold Tales Hydra Games
developers: Drageus Games LiMo Games Broken Arrow Games Hydra Games
summary: Don't Be Afraid is an adventure horror game, that allows you to personate a boy, kidnapped by a psychopath. You have to survive, escape and find out how you were kidnapped.

name: Kitchen Crisis
summary: Kitchen Crisis is a culinary defense game. You are abducted by aliens and must satisfy their appetite. If you want to live to see another day, efficiently arrange your cooking appliances, upgrade your ingredients and tools! In order to survive, make wise decisions according to everchanging recipes.

name: Pathless Woods
summary: Pathless Woods is a martial-art themed sandbox survival game, which gives players the freedom in how they interact with its world. They can form armies and fight against other inhabitants of the world, gather resources and build their dream base, farm their land with crops, or just explore the many land's biomes.

name: Withering Rooms
summary: Withering Rooms is a challenging 2.5D horror RPG set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Explore Mostyn House to collect the perfect items for your build and face a huge cast of overgrown undead, invisible ghosts, devious witches, and more.

name: Deceit 2
summary: Deceit 2 is the sequel to the original asymmetrical multiplayer horror game featuring enhanced Unreal Engine 5 visuals, an overhauled feature set that emphasizes strategic gameplay, and a new intense atmosphere.

name: Knowledge Keeper
summary: In Knowledge Keeper, you will become a keeper of knowledge, collecting shards of divine crystals. Look for the right way to crystals. Avoid dangerous obstacles. Teleport from one space to another to get closer to your goal. Solve tasks on memory, logic and orientation in space to get to the blocked areas.

name: Retro Mystery Club Vol.2: The Beppu Case
summary: The stage is set in Beppu, Oita Prefecture, for the latest installment in this retro mystery series! There, hearts that pass each other by can’t help but grow twisted… Uncover the truth behind a mysterious death with your junior detective, Ken!

name: Beat Slayer
summary: Join Mia, a badass music lover and crafty tinkerer, as she battles hordes of robots in a dystopian 90s inspired Berlin. There’s only one rule: Stay on beat!

name: Cats Organized Neatly
summary: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange your feline friends in a way that fits the grid. Cats Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of cats in all shapes and sizes.

name: Doll Explorer
summary: Doll Explorer is a turn-based strategy game in which players conquer dungeons by combining various actions such as "take one step forward" and "attack in front of player". The adventures of Tia the witch, Doll the magical life form, and Lilith the princess of the demon tribe begin!

name: Life of Slime
summary: You play as a slime named Slami, who has to find his way in life. You will have to accompany him on this path, helping him solve whatever problems arise.

name: Player Non Player
summary: Explore a strange island and meet four enigmatic characters. Interact with them, tame them and uncover their dreams. Can you help these characters so they can finally rest in peace?

name: Sugar Tanks 2
summary: Once again you will have to defend your sweet home world from evil grey tanks, trying to steal all the color from the candy forest! Defeat enemy tanks while dodging their attacks.

name: Tengoku Struggle -Strayside-
summary: Tengoku Struggle -Strayside- is set in a place where the living and the dead mingle, and sinners are pitted against each other in eternal battle.

name: Turbo Golf Racing
summary: Turbo Golf Racing is an arcade-style sports racing game for up to eight players online. Drive, boost, jump, flip and fly your Turbo-powered car. Slam into oversized golf balls. Race your friends in an explosive dash to the finish flag!

name: Desolatium
summary: DESOLATIUM is a first-person point & click Graphic Adventure based on Lovecraft Mythos. Live this horror story where you will have to visit mysterious locations, face lovecraftian creatures, find clues and combine objects to solve puzzles.

name: Heisting
summary: You are a masterful thief who embarks on a stealing spree across the world's most luxurious museums, galleries, and banks! Gather your crew of robbers and devise the perfect plan as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

name: No Umbrellas Allowed
summary: Reveal the true value of the items coming into your shop. Each item has their own history. Dig deep to see what is behind them and become an expert appraiser. Begin a tug-of-war with customers. With their own expectations and knowledge, they never give up on money.

name: Spy Guy Hidden Objects Deluxe Edition
summary: Venture out on a colorful and hand-drawn adventure with Spy Guy! Travel between cities in search of clues and don't let the bad guys get away with the treasures! Will you manage to find them all? Explore the detective world of the bravest Treflik the detective and help him save Treflik City.

name: Cosmic Hare
summary: Cosmic Hare is a casual puzzle game based on the classic board game ‘Peg Solitaire’: Pieces can be moved by jumping over adjacent pieces, and the goal is to remove all but the last piece from the board.

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
summary: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions is a gamified focus tool, set to a soothing lofi soundtrack. Discover and collect Spirits, customize your cozy virtual space, and facilitate your real-life tasks with a collection of handy features designed to improve concentration and ease stress.

name: Chopter Copter
summary: Chopter til you dropter as you propel yourself to greatness and soar for the top score in this high-flying experience! Control the titular chopter copter with the crank and use it to slice, dice, and weave your way through wacky weirdos! Learn their patterns, liberate them of their blood, then juggle the gibs to rocket your score to new heights (just like in real life!).

name: Inkbound
summary: Inkbound is a colorful co-op roguelike tactics/RPG in a world where stories come to life. An unknown force begins to unbind these stories and the worlds they create. It’s up to you and your friends to protect them.

name: Laysara: Summit Kingdom
publishers: Future Friends Games Quite OK Games
summary: Are you skilled enough to make your town thrive in the mountainous city-builder Laysara: Summit Kingdom? Adjust your build strategy to gameplay-affecting vegetation zones and expand to more distant mountain slopes to reach scarce resources.

name: Space Prison
summary: Don't let the system break you. Survive in the Space Prison by crafting contraband, upgrading your prison cell, fighting alien creatures in turn-based brawls and climbing to the top of the gangster ladder in this social survival.

name: Yet Another Fantasy Title
summary: Yet Another Fantasy Title is an open-world, top-down action RPG set in an absurd fantasy universe full of pop-culture references. Play as the Rogue and go on an epic quest to kill the dragon.

name: Glorious Savior
summary: An everlasting story about the hero's sword with animated 3D battles!

name: Infection Free Zone
summary: Infection Free Zone is a city-building strategy game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Become an apocalypse survivor. Lead a group of people still alive and mentally healthy from your city and try to establish a new "Infection Free Zone" that will make it through the night.

name: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room
summary: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room is the sequel of the award-nominated multiplayer escape game Mad Experiments. Alone or with up to 5 friends, follow the story of Hildegarde and Professor Cheshire, explore rich environments to find clues, and solve mind-bending puzzles to escape!

name: Super R-Type
summary: In Super R-Type, you are the R-9, Earth's most advanced form of defense against the evil BYDO Empire. There are seven stages you must go through, picking up power-up items to defeat the stage bosses. Are you up for it?

name: Wildfrost
summary: Take on the elements in Wildfrost, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder! The sun has frozen over, and the town of Snowdwell and its survivors stand as the last bastion against an eternal winter.

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets
summary: Survival Horror in first person where you must manage your ammunition well, explore varied scenarios and face nightmarish beings, while investigating the macabre experiments with children, the result of a mind unhinged by madness and family loss.

name: Outer Terror
summary: DON’T DIE as you assemble a ridiculous arsenal of weapons and desperately hold out against massive hordes of creatures pulled from a variety of classic horror genres reminiscent of 80s and 90s Golden Age comics and B-movies in this stylish action-packed arcade roguelite.

name: Grounded
summary: Grounded is a take on the survival genre where you've been shrunken down to the size of an ant and must gather, craft, and build bases in a suburban backyard environment with three other players.

name: Vertical Kingdom
summary: There's nowhere to go but up! Vertical Kingdom is a card-based city builder roguelite with a twist - you can only build vertically, literally reaching for the sky with each city. Lead expeditions to gather resources, construct metropolises, and build ever upwards!

name: Harold Halibut
summary: Harold Halibut is a modern adventure game, with a strong focus on storytelling and exploration. Take in the atmosphere and be a part of this utopia-turned-awry.

name: Planet of Lana
summary: A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures in Planet of Lana, a cinematic puzzle adventure framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.

name: Rauniot
summary: Rauniot is an isometric post-apocalyptic point and click adventure game full of intriguing puzzles with classical gameplay elements. Story takes place in beautiful and detailed scenery of Northern Finland.

name: Sticky Business
summary: Experience the joy of running your own cozy small business: Create stickers, pack orders and hear your customers’ stories. Time to build the cutest shop on the internet!

name: Artificer's Tower
summary: Are you the master of the magical arts? Prove it in this new colony-sim wizard tower defense game. Build your base, keep your mages happy, craft recipes, research new magics, and defend your wizard's keep. Will your Artificer's Tower be the envy of all your magical friends?

name: Final Fantasy XVI: The Rising Tide
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III
summary: Wave two of the Final Fantasy XVI expansion pack.

name: Nexus 5X
summary: eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, eXterminate, EXPRESS. Experience all of the depth, diplomacy, conflict and conquest of a turn-based 4X epic but played in fast-paced 60-minute sessions, solo or in multiplayer for 2-8 players.

name: Soul Covenant
summary: Soul Covenant is a VR Tactical Action game experience with a high level of immersion, where the player will be one with the protagonist and take on a battle for the fate of the world.

name: Internet Cafe Evolution
summary: This is a business simulation and construction game. It tells the evolution history of Internet cafes that began in the 1990s.

name: Whisker Waters
summary: Whisker Waters is the ultimate RPG adventure that blends light fantasy and the art of fishing into a mesmerizing world. As a player, you'll create and play as your very own Cat character and embark on a whimsical fishing journey like never before.

name: Lunar Lander: Beyond
summary: Prepare to warp through space and time with a reimagining of a timeless classic, Lunar Lander: Beyond. Built from the ground up, this celestial journey combines the charm of the past with the technology of the future, introducing highly optimized simulation gameplay and a thrilling narrative.

name: Sucker for Love: Date to Die For
summary: Once again putting the “love” back into “Lovecraftian horror,” Sucker for Love: Date to Die For introduces a new protagonist, new abominable love interests, new occult rituals, and a whole lot of heartache.

name: Meta-Ghost: The Breaking Show
summary: Immerse yourself in the reality show - "Breaking Show", where you engage in real-time battles with various intelligent machines using cybernetic enhancements and weapons. Whether for personal gain or lofty ideals. Fight! Until you reach the final victory on this Rogue-lite journey.

name: Another Crab’s Treasure
summary: In the undersea soulslike adventure of Another Crab’s Treasure, you are Kril the hermit crab, who will embark on an epic treasure hunt to buy back your repossessed shell, and discover the dark secrets behind the polluted ocean.

name: Crossy Road Castle
summary: Join the Crossy Road crew in this endlessly spinning cooperative tower climb. Bring your friends and see how far you can get!

name: SaGa Emerald Beyond
summary: Experience the distinct and dramatic stories of six heroes with vastly different backgrounds, including a young man who fights with sentient puppets, a witch masking her identity, a crime-fighting duo, a songstress mech who lost her voice and body and a recently awakened king of darkness.

name: Class Of Heroes 1 & 2: Complete Edition
summary: Hit JRPG dungeon crawler returns, remastered! As a first year student at Particus Academy, you must study hard and train even harder. Build up a cohort of students, educate them in the art of evasion and train them in the fundamentals of combat.

name: Pools
summary: Explore, admire and listen. Relaxing. Uncanny. Eerie. Hypnotic. Immersive. No monsters chasing you or jumping towards at your screen, but the game can feel oppressive at times by invoking fears of getting lost, the dark, tight spaces and outwardly architecture. Liminal spaces, inspired by backrooms.

name: Super Dragon Punch Force 3
summary: Super Dragon Punch Force 3 is a geek-inspired fighting game.

name: Truck Driver: Heading North
summary: Expand your Truck Driver experience with the 'Heading North' DLC! Drive around beautiful Nordic inspired landscapes as you continue your trucking career and complete numerous jobs for new characters.

name: Footgun: Underground
summary: Roguelike meets soccer! Prove your ball skills and dribble your way through a randomly generated, dangerous track network full of deadly challenges! Face post-apocalyptic mutants, improve your balls with high-tech upgrades and escape the pixel art underground labyrinth.

name: Sea of Thieves
summary: The freedom of the pirate life awaits in Sea of Thieves, a shared-world adventure game filled with unknown dangers and loot for the taking. Be the pirates you want to be and share adventures with friends in a world where every sail on the horizon is another crew of players with unknown intent.

name: The Foretold: Westmark Legacy
summary: The Foretold: Westmark Legacy is a gothic horror adventure card game where you fight to investigate another day. Equip items and relics. Acquire cards and use them wisely to survive what lurks in the darkest corners of town.

name: Piko Interactive Collection 4
summary: Piko Interactive Collection 4 includes Glover, 2D platformers Risky Woods and The Fidgetts, side scrolling games like Bad Street Brawlers, Target Renegade and Skuljagger, puzzle games Mermaids of Atlantis, 3D FPS action with Zero Tolerance Underground, 3D Space shooting action with Star X and the racing title, Street Racer!

name: Arken Age
summary: Arken Age is a VR action-adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

name: Awkward 2: The Party Game of Savage Secrets
summary: Awkward 2 is the adult multiplayer party game filled with dark, hilarious & sometimes downright disturbing questions. Laugh, debate, defend and find out things you never wanted to know about your friends!

name: Brews & Bastards
summary: Brews & Bastards is a chaotic co-op dungeon crawler for 1-4 players, overflowing with action-packed combat, magical brews and outlandish tavern games. Select from a group of distinct heroes and blast your way through hordes of drunken demons in search of the stolen Brew Stone.

name: Death Relives
summary: Be prepared for a first-person look on life through the eyes of a teenager, who is trying to escape from mighty Aztec god Xipe Totec. Get ready for a chaotic experience with horror and survival mechanics.

name: Dross
summary: Dross is an FPS Roguelike set in a derelict facility infested with alien bugs. Travel a procedurally generated world, get powerful weapons and equipment, and upgrade your gear to survive. Fight the Dross, discover and destroy the infestation, and uncover the secrets of this mysterious installation.

name: EvilVEvil
summary: Live out your ultimate vampire power fantasy as you carve, bite, and shoot a path through evil in this action-packed blood-thirsty co-op shooter.

name: Flock
summary: Flock is a multiplayer co-op game about the joy of flight and collecting adorable flying creatures with your friends. Soar through beautiful landscapes, seeking out rare and elusive creatures to add to your flock.

name: Hired 2 Die
summary: Evil beings are lurking in workplaces for prey. Alone or with a friend, accept a job from a mysterious company to turn the tide against the darkness. Use security systems and CCTV cameras to survive. Decypher complex systems to hunt creatures and buy equipment to avoid a terrible death.

name: Irem Collection Volume 3
publishers: Tozai Irem Software Engineering Strictly Limited Games ININ Games
summary: The third compilation of Irem arcade games features Mr. Heli (Arcade, PC Engine), Dragon Breed (Arcade), and Mystic Riders (Arcade).

name: Lords of Ravage
summary: Become the final boss of the dungeon: create your own playing style by combining followers from different factions in spectacular turn-based combat.

name: Mira and The Legend of the Djinns
summary: Mira: The Legend of the Djinns is a Metroidvania style game inspired by Moroccan and Amazigh culture, language, and spiritual traditions.

name: Octopath Traveler II
summary: Venture into the world of Solistia and experience a new era with eight brand-new travelers in Octopath Traveler II, an RPG sequel which takes the series’ HD-2D graphics, a fusion of retro pixel art and 3DCG, to even greater heights.

name: Return Alive
summary: Return Alive is a Top-Down Post-Apocalyptic Looter Shooter with PvE and PvP elements where players compete to survive. Players can utilize a variety of loadouts, including different characters, weapons, and battlesuits.

name: Seablip
summary: Fight as a pirate. Upgrade your ship. Dig for treasure. Fish. Or investigate why the polar ice is melting. A long journey with mystery and adventure awaits!

name: Sugardew Island - Your Cozy Farm Shop
summary: In this cozy farming game, you have to run your own farm shop. Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade the island and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the island with life again.

name: The Constructors
summary: Become the owner of a construction company and help rebuild Wondersville's crumbling urban landscape. Design new neighborhoods, hire contractors to execute your vision, and try to stay calm handling your clients. Will you play by the rules or cut corners to maximize your profits?

name: The Nameless: Slay Dragon
developers: 无名之剑工作室 Nameless Sword Studio
summary: The Nameless: Slay Dragon is a gamebook-adventure flavored turn-based RPG In short - how to slay the immensely powerful and cunning evil dragon? You will play as a young man having a bloody feud with a dragon, and face powerful, sinister and tricky enemies with friends....

name: Unbroken
summary: Brave the hostile lands in search of your goal. Forge your own path and discover the many secrets of the realm and the looming Township of Westfall. Unlock new abilities, perks and weapons. Soak in the atmosphere and head forth against all odds.

name: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double
summary: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double is an immersive adventure game where you investigate urban legends in a modern city.

name: Zoochosis
summary: Zoochosis is a bodycam horror simulation game. You’re a night zookeeper. Identify infected mutant animals, make a vaccine and cure them. Will you save all of them and survive?

name: Armed and Gelatinous: Couch Edition
summary: Armed and Gelatinous pits friends against one another in fast-paced rounds of couch-competitive warfare! Play as one of four adorable gelatinous blobs in the far reaches of space, gaining firepower by sticking to a variety of deadly weapons.

name: Endless Ocean: Luminous
summary: Take a deep breath and plunge into the Veiled Sea: an unexplored region with discoveries that change with each dive. Encounter and learn about over 500 species of marine life—some of which are presumed extinct, or even mythical!

name: MotoGP 24
summary: Rev up your engines, MotoGP 24 is back! Dive into the heart-pounding action of the 2024 season and immerse yourself in the thrills of unexplored landscapes, all thanks to the revolutionary Riders market!

name: Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya
summary: Rebuild Mystia’s ransacked restaurant and become the best tavern of Gensokyo once again! During the day, collect region-specific ingredients and recipes from familiar locales like the Hakurei Shrine and Human Village. Craft an ambiance with staff outfits, decorations, and music, then execute a flawless dinner service at night by cooking up customer requests with love and hospitality.

name: Ingression
summary: Ingression is an unforgiving precision platformer where you'll think and platform with seamless portals. Travel to the future to save the past from a tremendous time paradox.

name: Heading Out
summary: It's you, your car and the road. As you drive across the USA, people take notice. But nobody knows where you'll end up - not even you.

name: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona
summary: Following an ancient undead, risen from the grave with no way of communicating but a clear sense of purpose, players will explore a huge variety of hand-crafted levels from fog-shrouded ruins to the Sun-city where an unspeakable evil lingers.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Winds of Change
summary: Winds of Change makes wide-ranging changes to twenty nations stretching from the Andean highlands to the vast steppes of Mongolia. There are many new branching missions, government reforms, events, estate privileges and more!

name: Pocket Oasis
summary: Plan and design your mini-Eden with a variety of plants, pets, and decorations, and watch your little garden grow from seedlings to lush (and delicious), fruitful plants. Along with a cozy soundtrack and beautiful hand-painted visuals, Pocket Oasis provides the perfect escape from city living.

name: Crow Country
summary: Explore a small theme park known as Crow Country to learn of what happened to the park's missing owner.

name: Little Kitty, Big City
summary: You're a curious little kitty with a big personality, on an adventure to find your way back home. Explore the city, make new friends, wear delightful hats, and leave more than a little chaos in your wake.

name: Ships At Sea
summary: Experience the thrill of navigating a wide range of ships. Immerse yourself in various career paths such as service, cargo and commercial fishing, as you explore the breathtaking open world of Norway´s Lofoten Islands with its stunning scenery. The ocean is within your reach!

name: Neptunia Game Maker R:Evolution
summary: With the assistance of the Gamindustri Goddesses, CPU Candidates, and three brand-new goddesses, the video game industry is yours for the taking. Help Older Nep revive a ruined game studio, take down rival studios, and monopolize shares!

name: The Rogue Prince of Persia
summary: A 2D roguelite in the Prince of Persia franchise, developed by Evil Empire, the studio behind Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania.

name: Ghost of Tsushima: Director's Cut
summary: Ghost of Tsushima: Director's Cut is an updated version of Ghost of Tushima that includes the exclusive Iki Island story expansion, director's commentary, and the Legends online co-opmode.

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver
summary: In Read Only Memories: Neurodiver, the next mystery adventure set in the world of MidBoss’ 2064: Read Only Memories, return to the vibrant cyberpunk world of Neo-San Francisco

name: Gestalt: Steam & Cinder
summary: Gestalt: Steam and Cinder is a narrative-focused, 2d action-adventure set in a stunningly handcrafted steampunk world. Players are thrust into a high-octane adventure filled with twists and turns on a journey of discovery.

name: System Shock
summary: From the meticulous old-school craftsmen behind System Shock: Enhanced Edition comes a brand new, completely remastered version of the stunning original FPS/RPG hybrid.

name: Bread & Fred
summary: Grab your best bud for help in this new co-op challenge to help two adorable penguins, Bread and Fred, reach the top of the snowy summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls and swing across gaps to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain.

name: Morbid: The Lords of Ire
summary: Face vile monsters and wade through oceans of gore as you battle to defeat the Lords of Ire in a grim world of pain & suffering.

name: Zet Zillions
summary: Zet Zillions is a single player story-based roguelike deckbuilder and space extravaganza where you use your cards to make entire planets go big-badda-BOOM!

name: Construction Simulator 4
summary: Green forests, cozy wooden cabins, and tranquil bays - Construction Simulator 4 transports players into a scenic map inspired by the Canadian landscape. Pinewood Bay features different areas with unique locations offering special challenges for construction. By completing different construction sites, players expand their construction empire and unlock new areas, jobs, and machines.

name: TEVI
summary: Embark on an epic action-adventure as you slash, dash, and combo your way through a sprawling land scarred by conflict. Explore and discover hidden secrets. Customize your build to triumph in spectacular boss fights and unravel the mysteries of the world in TEVI, a bullet hell metroidvania!

name: Xuan Yuan Sword VII
summary: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII is a third-person Action-RPG rooted in Chinese history and mythology.

name: Backrooms
summary: The Backrooms is an Online Co-Op experience with friends, dynamic levels, and proximity voice chat. Create your own levels with the in-game level editor. Face the unknown together, communicating strategically in this chilling adventure.

name: Vigor
summary: 1991. The nuclear war is over. Central Europe is devastated, and Norway has become the last stand. You start as a nameless outlander, but who will you become?

name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape
summary: The ten-year journey of Destiny’s Light & Darkness Saga is approaching its epic conclusion with the Destiny 2: The Final Shape expansion.

name: Blockbuster Inc.
summary: Ever dreamed of making your own movies? Build up your own movie studio, scout for the upcoming stars, and produce cutting-edge films and TV shows. Try to stay ahead of your competition throughout the history of cinematography.

name: Tour de France 2024
franchises: Pro Cycling Manager / Le Tour de France
summary: Win a Grand Tour and claim the yellow jersey in the official game of the Tour de France 2024. Beat your opponents, push yourself to the limit and show what you're capable of in the new multiplayer mode: Criterium.

name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin
summary: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin puts players in the role of a Monster Rider who befriends iconic monsters from the Monster Hunter series as they embark on epic adventures together!

name: #BLUD
summary: Save your friends, fight off the vampire apocalypse, and survive the horrors of freshman field hockey practice in #BLUD, a delightfully zany animated dungeon crawler that blurs the line between action RPGs and hyperkinetic 90s cartoons.

name: Rusted Moss
summary: Use a unique physics-based elastic grappling hook to propel your character forward in this 2D sidescrolling grapplevania. Like rock climbing, there's no set path through this melancholic abandoned wasteland. Latch onto any moss-covered structure and swing your way through this rugged terrain.

name: Enotria: The Last Song
summary: Enotria: The Last Song is a soulslike set in a beautiful sun-lit world inspired by Italian folklore where the brightest sun casts the darkest shadow. Wear unique role-altering masks, face formidable foes and alter reality with the power of Ardore to unravel the secrets of Enotria.

name: Luigi's Mansion 2 HD
summary: Luigi's Mansion 2 HD is a visually enhanced version of Luigi’s Mansion: Dark Moon, originally released on Nintendo 3DS, for Nintendo Switch. Can Luigi summon the courage to save Evershade Valley? Explore haunted mansions full of spooky specters and bone-chilling challenges.

name: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate
summary: Discover rich worlds, encounter heart-pounding action and solve mind-bending puzzles as you rewrite the past to reshape the future, finding yourself thrust headfirst into thrilling stories from history in an epic time travel adventure like no other.

name: Apex Legends: The Board Game
summary: This tabletop adaptation brings tactical skirmish and battle royale gameplay to the board. Featuring legendary characters and a buildable tabletop environment based on in-game maps, this is the ultimate experience for fans of the hit title.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Dawntrail
summary: Dawntrail includes a number of new content features, including new allied tribes, a level cap increase, multiple new jobs, new dungeons, new enemies, loads of new gear and recipes, and much, much more.

name: Darkest Dungeon II
summary: Delve deeply into the Darkest Dungeon with the sequel to the roguelike RPG hit.

name: Asphalt Legends Unite
summary: Take on the world’s most fearless drivers and become the next Asphalt Legend! Pick your dream ride and race across spectacular locations around the world.

name: Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders
summary: The ABC Murders is an adventure and investigation game adapted from the classic Agatha Christie novel. You are the famous private detective Hercule Poirot and, once again, you find yourself up against a mysterious serial killer who goes by the name of "ABC".

name: One Piece Odyssey
summary: One Piece Odyssey is an RPG which brings transports the Straw Hats to a mysterious new island where they embark on quests and fight powerful enemies and massive bosses in exciting turn-based battles.

name: TMNT Splintered Fate
summary: Join Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael on a co-op roguelike adventure where their unique attacks combine with randomized power-ups for some gnarly fun. Search for clues and hints across NYC with help from familiar allies like April, Metalhead, Casey Jones, and more.

name: A Corgi's Cozy Hike
summary: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure around a peaceful island paradise. Discover ancient corgi superpowers to climb, fly, and sail your way to tasty treats and cozy nap spots. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.

name: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure
summary: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure follows the story of Jemma, a small-town misfit on a journey of self-discovery. Venturing out beyond her stiflingly cozy confines, she finds an inspiring world - but also one ruled by fear, and a strange, immovable ‘static’ force. Can she disrupt a culture of stagnation, and find a place to fit into it?

name: Bzzzt
summary: Jump into the retro-future world with the nostalgic arcade journey of a tiny robot ZX8000! Upgrade your robotic abilities, challenge yourself in stages full of ever-changing gameplay mechanics, and compete with other players in global and friends leaderboards.

name: College Football 25
summary: EA Sports returns to the college bowl circuit with this brand new College Football game series.

name: Dark Sky
summary: Lead a party of unlikely heroes as they uncover the truth behind a planetary catastrophe in this immersive turn-based RPG. Craft and upgrade character cards into powerful combos while you battle your way through this beautifully hand-drawn alien world!

name: Duck Paradox
summary: Shoot bouncing bullets to kill corrupted versions of your Pet Duck. Slow down time to maneuver in a flashy way as you try to solve puzzles under pressure and chain explosions to rescue the original version of your Pet Duck!

name: Endzone 2
summary: Endzone 2 is a post-apocalyptic survival colony builder, where you embark to secure humanities survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world.

name: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn
summary: Gods and guns collide in the open-world action-RPG Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic and embark on an epic journey to lead mankind’s final siege against the tide of the dead.

name: GreedFall II: The Dying World
summary: GreedFall 2 is an RPG that focuses on story and player choice as it revisits the unique universe created by its predecessor. Using diplomacy, cunning, or combat, it’s up to you to end one man’s ambitions of conquest, which could spell the end for the continent and your island.

name: Hyper Light Breaker
summary: Enter the Overgrowth, a new land in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore massive biomes, defeat brutal monsters, create new builds, and overthrow the almighty Abyss King in Hyper Light Breaker, an open-world adventure from the creators of Hyper Light Drifter.

name: Little Sim World
summary: Set in the heart of London, Little Sim World is a cozy 2D Life Simulator that reshapes how players engage with their surroundings. Customize your character’s preferences and living space while interacting with an array of characters. Enjoy the various city activities and just have fun!

name: Lucky Tower Ultimate
summary: A unique roguelike adventure where failing to escape a dangerous tower looks like a cartoon and feels like a joke.

name: Monster Hunter Stories [Remaster]
summary: Become a Monster Rider and befriend countless monsters from the Monster Hunter series in this enhanced version of the original RPG.

name: Once Human
summary: Once Human is a survival game where players need to persevere in the wilderness, fighting against the aberrant monsters.

name: Preserve
summary: Preserve is a relaxing puzzle nature-building game in which you flourish a vibrant ecosystem by cleverly placing plants and animals to create a perfect symbiosis to your liking.

name: Reality Break
summary: Discover the origin of your new abilities in a fast-paced ARPG Loot Collection Roguelite where you will bend, break, and change the rules of spacetime itself!

name: Stormgate
summary: Stormgate is a free-to-play real-time strategy game set amidst a war between humanity and an onslaught of alien invaders. Explore an ever-evolving story through thrilling campaign missions where science fiction and fantasy collide -- solo or cooperatively.

name: Techno Banter
