summary: Surrounded by bright neons, filthy streets and even filthier techno beats, it is you who guard the entrance to the rave. Sharpen your wits and deliver lyrical smackdowns to those not worthy of partying. But beware - the stakes may or may not involve blowing up the city.

name: The Holy Gosh Darn
summary: The Holy Gosh Darn is a narrative adventure with a time-travelling twist.

name: Tokyo Xanadu eX+
summary: Explore Morimiya City for rifts leading to the Eclipse and battle hordes of mind-bending monsters across 40+ hours of Action-RPG gameplay in Tokyo Xanadu. In this definitive version of Tokyo Xanadu experience the game in 60 FPS along with new scenarios, new playable characters, new modes and more!

name: Unknown 9: Awakening
summary: You play as Haroona, a Quaestor born with the ability to venture into the Fold: a mysterious dimension that overlaps our own. On her quest for powerful hidden knowledge, she will learn to master her unique connection to the Fold, which allows her to channel its powers into our world...but such power does not go unnoticed. Haroona quickly becomes the target of the Ascendants, a splinter faction of a secret society known as the LYS, who want to use the Fold to alter the course of human history.

name: Wardens Rising
summary: Mix of PvE hero shooter action with base defense for an experience unlike any other. Embark on a campaign to save humanity, protecting vital energy cores from massive invasions. Use abilities, items, build defense towers and more while destroying invaders and their bosses. Play Solo or Coop!

name: Cat Quest III
summary: Cat Quest III you sail the seas to wherever you want in your own pirate ship, laying waste to warms of Pi-rats along the way.

name: Black Myth: WuKong
summary: Black Myth: WuKong it's an epic action game inspired by the classic myth of The Monkey King.

name: Flashback 2
summary: Remember the future in the official follow-up to the sci-fi classic Flashback: The Quest for Identity.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II
summary: The galaxy is in peril. Entire worlds are falling. The Imperium needs you. Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor’s warriors. Unleash deadly abilities and an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid hordes.

name: Highway Police Simulator
summary: Welcome to Caminora! Immerse yourself in the authentic police work of the American Highway Patrol. Solve cases, chase criminals and explore the open-world. Choose your officer and tackle the everyday life on the highways. Will you be able to maintain law and order?

name: Terminator: Survivors
summary: Play as a survivor in an open world set after Judgment Day where you, alone or in co-op, scavenge resources to build a base of operations for mankind. But you’re not alone. Skynet’s machines hunt you down as well as rival human factions.

name: Anima Flux
summary: Anima Flux is a co-op metroidvania with two genetically enhanced soldiers, special agents of a theocratic dictatorial regime. Fight your way through swarms of mutants through a desolate, dystopian space city and save humanity's last stronghold, if, of course, anyone is still alive...

name: Asgard's Fall
summary: Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Survivors-like Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?

name: Corpse Party 2: Darkness Distortion
summary: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion follows three high school friends; Haruka Nanami, Nemu Takanashi, and Maria Hitsugi, as they explore the Amare Est Vivere Hospital, testing a local urban legend as the streamer Nemu seeks to boost her subscriber count.

name: Out of Action
summary: Action heavy, multiplayer and singleplayer FPS set in a brutal cyberpunk universe.

name: RPG Maker WITH
summary: Design classic RPGs with distinct visual styles, one-of-a-kind stories, and high-action boss battles. Share creations online for feedback or play the creations of others to give constructive feedback.

name: Viking Survivors
summary: Viking Survivors is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of creatures while learning powerful skills to enhance your warrior. Unlock new characters, weapons and abilities. Design the most broken build and slay your enemies before they surround you!

name: Antonblast
summary: Antonblast is an explosive, action-packed retro platformer featuring a destructive twist to classic gameplay. Destruction worker Dynamite Anton has a bone to pick when Satan steals Anton’s prized Spirit collection. Blast through buildings, fight your demons, and explore wonky worlds in Antonblast!

name: On Air
summary: In the first-person, sci-fi, survival horror game On Air, you alone explore the gloomy old hotel Algol. Waking up trapped in one of the hotel rooms, you must hide from your pursuers, find an informant, and figure out what happened here.
